GP12garup3_u:1936: saṃkarṣaṇācca garuḍa jayāyāṃ yo vabhūva ha /
GP12garup3_u:1937: sa vāyuḥ prathamo jñeyo pradhāna iti kīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,16.21 //
GP12garup3_u:1939: badarīsthasya viṣṇośca dhairyeṇa stavanāya saḥ // GarP_3,16.22 //
GP12garup3_u:1942: yato hṛdi sthito vāyustato vai dhṛtisaṃjñakaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1943: sarveṣāṃ ca dṛdi sthitvā smarate sarvadā harim // GarP_3,16.24 //
GP12garup3_u:1946: sadā smarati vai vīndra atosau smṛtisaṃjñakaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1947: sarveṣāṃ ca hṛdisthitvā jñāto viṣṇorudīraṇāt // GarP_3,16.26 //
GP12garup3_u:1951: viṣṇau bhaktiṃ vardhyati bhaktānāṃ hṛdi saṃsthitaḥ // GarP_3,16.28 //
GP12garup3_u:1955: prabhuḥ prabhūṇāṃ garuḍa sodarāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // GarP_3,16.30 //
GP12garup3_u:1957: sarveṣāṃ ca hṛhi sthitvā balaṃ paśyati sattama // GarP_3,16.31 //
GP12garup3_u:1959: sarveṣāṃ ca hṛdi sthitvā putrapautrādikairjanaiḥ // GarP_3,16.32 //
GP12garup3_u:1962: vakratvaṃ nāsti yogasya ṛjuryogya iti smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1967: ato na ṛjavo jñeyā manuṣyāṇāṃ ca kā kathā // GarP_3,16.36 //
GP12garup3_u:1971: mokṣādhikāriṇaḥ sarve kurvate kasya pūjanam // GarP_3,16.38 //
GP12garup3_u:1975: jñānaṃ ca viparītaṃ syāttena yātyadharaṃ tamaḥ // GarP_3,16.40 //
GP12garup3_u:1979: śive sūrye paṇmukhe ca viṣṇubuddhiḥ khageśvara // GarP_3,16.42 //
GP12garup3_u:1981: śilādyeṣu ca sarveṣu aikyenava vicintanam // GarP_3,16.43 //
GP12garup3_u:1985: anyeṣāṃ sarvadā nāsti ato na ṛjavaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,16.45 //
GP12garup3_u:1987: mokṣādhikāriṇāṃ kāle ataḥ prajñeti kathyate // GarP_3,16.46 //
GP12garup3_u:1989: ato vāyuḥ sadā vīndra jñānamityeva kīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,16.47 //
GP12garup3_u:1991: tataśca gurusaṃjñāṃ cāpyavāpa sa ca mārutaḥ // GarP_3,16.48 //
GP12garup3_u:1992: yogināṃ hṛdaye sthitvā sadhyāyati hariṃ param /
GP12garup3_u:1993: pārthakyenāpi taṃ dhyāyanmahādhyāteti sa smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,16.49 //
GP12garup3_u:1996: ato vai vijñanāmāsau prokto hi khagasattama /
GP12garup3_u:1997: kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tyāgādvirāga iti sa smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,16.51 //
GP12garup3_u:1998: athavāyogināṃ nityaṃ hṛdi sthitvā sa mārutaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1999: vairāgyaṃ saṃjanayati virāga iti sa smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,16.52 //
GP12garup3_u:2001: tatsukhaṃ tūttareṣāṃ ca vāyuparyantameva ca // GarP_3,16.53 //
GP12garup3_u:2002: devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca uttamānāṃ nṛṇāṃ tathā /
GP12garup3_u:2004: bhunakti sarvadā vīdraṃ tatra mukhyastu mārutaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2005: duḥ khaśokādikaṃ kiñciddevānāṃ bhavati prabho // GarP_3,16.55 //
GP12garup3_u:2008: yataḥ kaliścādhikaḥ syādato duḥ khīti sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2009: daityānāṃ puṇyapāpābhyāṃ duḥ kha mevottarottaram // GarP_3,16.57 //
GP12garup3_u:2011: bhunakti sarvadā vīndra tataḥ kaliriti smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,16.58 //
GP12garup3_u:2013: devāveśo bhavettasya nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,16.59 //
GP12garup3_u:2017: tamo nāstyeva devānāṃ duḥ khaṃ nāsti svarūpataḥ // GarP_3,16.61 //
GP12garup3_u:2018: viṣayotthaṃ mahāduḥ khaṃ devānāṃ nāsti sarvadā /
GP12garup3_u:2019: duḥ khaśokādikaṃ kiṃ cidasurāveśato bhavet // GarP_3,16.62 //
GP12garup3_u:2020: ataḥ kaliḥ sadā duḥ khī sukhī vāyustu sarvadā /
GP12garup3_u:2021: manuṣyāṇā mṛṣīṇāṃ ca sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ khageśvara // GarP_3,16.63 //
GP12garup3_u:2023: kaṣṭabhaṅgaḥ kalilayo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,16.64 //
GP12garup3_u:2025: praviṣṭāḥ saṃti lokeṣu pṛthaksaṃti khageśvara // GarP_3,16.65 //
GP12garup3_u:2030: ato rocananāmāsau marudaṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ rāmāvatāre hanumānrāmakāryārthasādhakaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2031: sa eva bhīmasenastu jāto bhūmyāṃ mahābalaḥ // GarP_3,16.68 //
GP12garup3_u:2034: sarveṣāṃ saṃkaraṃ yastu kariṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,16.70 //
GP12garup3_u:2037: tadā bhūmau vāsudevo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2038: yajñārthaiḥ sadṛśo yasya nāsti loke caturdaśe // GarP_3,16.72 //
GP12garup3_u:2039: ataḥ sa prajñayā pūrṇo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2044: nāsti nāstyeva vāyostu tathā vairocanādike // GarP_3,16.75 //
GP12garup3_u:2046: nāsti nāstyeva pakṣīndra yato nāstyaśubhaṃ tataḥ // GarP_3,16.76 //
GP12garup3_u:2047: pūrvaṃ garbhaṃ samāśoṣya samaye prabhavasya ca /
GP12garup3_u:2053: etasya śravaṇādeva mokṣaṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2056: striyau dve yamale caiva tayormadhye tu yadyikā // GarP_3,16.81 //
GP12garup3_u:2059: caturmukhasya bhāryā tu kīrtitā sā sarasvatī // GarP_3,16.82 //
GP12garup3_u:2069: mahāgurorhi vāyośca bhāryā vai parikīrtitā // GarP_3,16.87 //
GP12garup3_u:2071: dhṛtirūpasya vāyośca bhāryā sā parikīrtitā // GarP_3,16.88 //
GP12garup3_u:2073: mahāprabhośca vāyośca bhāryā vai sā prakīrtitā // GarP_3,16.89 //
GP12garup3_u:2075: atastu bhāratī jñeyā bhujināmnā prakīrtitā // GarP_3,16.90 //
GP12garup3_u:2077: rocanendrasya bhāryā ca śraddhākhyā parikīrtitā // GarP_3,16.91 //
GP12garup3_u:2079: tadā śivākhyaviprācca jajñe sā bhāratī smṛtā // GarP_3,16.92 //
GP12garup3_u:2083: tretānte saiva pakṣīndra śacyādyaiścaiva saṃyutā // GarP_3,16.94 //
GP12garup3_u:2088: kiñcitkālaṃ tathā sthitvā kanyaiva mṛti māpa sā /
GP12garup3_u:2091: tatrānyagātvaṃ nāstyeva yogaśca saha bhartṛbhiḥ // GarP_3,16.98 //
GP12garup3_u:2093: kālī nāmnā tu sā jñeyā bhīmasenapriyā sadā // GarP_3,16.99 //
GP12garup3_u:2096: saṃkarasya gṛhe vīndra bhaviṣyati kalau yuge /
GP12garup3_u:2097: vāyostṛtīyarūpārthaṃ sā kanyaiva mṛtiṃ gatā // GarP_3,16.101 //
GP12garup3_u:2099: svabhartṛbhyāṃ ca pakṣīndra guṇaiścaiva śatādhamāḥ // GarP_3,16.102 //
GP12garup3_u:2100: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe mahālakṣmyavatārādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2104: caturjanmasu vai kṛṣṇa śacyādyaiḥ saha bhāratī /
GP12garup3_u:2105: ekadeha viśiṣṭaiva bhuvi jāteti coktavān // GarP_3,17.1 //
GP12garup3_u:2106: kāraṇaṃ brūhi me brahman śiṣyāya tava suvrata /
GP12garup3_u:2110: vakṣyāmi kāraṇaṃ vīndra sāvadhānamanāḥ śṛṇu // GarP_3,17.3 //
GP12garup3_u:2111: purā kṛtayuge vīndra rudrabhāryā ca pārvatī /
GP12garup3_u:2112: indrabhāryā śacī devī yama bhāryāca śāmalā // GarP_3,17.4 //
GP12garup3_u:2113: aśvibhāryā uṣā devī bhartṛbhiḥ sahitā khaga /
GP12garup3_u:2116: dṛṣṭvā tā uddhatā brahmā śaśāpa khagasattama // GarP_3,17.6 //
GP12garup3_u:2121: tūṣṇīmeva sthite vīndra vañcayantyaḥ sthitāḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2124: trivāraṃ vañcanaṃ yasmādekavāraṃ ca darśanam // GarP_3,17.10 //
GP12garup3_u:2128: tṛtīye janmani tathā bhartṛsaṃyoga māpsyatha // GarP_3,17.12 //
GP12garup3_u:2130: tathā svabhartṛsaṃyogaṃ nāvāpsyatha ca sarvaśaḥ // GarP_3,17.13 //
GP12garup3_u:2131: evaṃ śaptāstu tāḥ sarvā brahmaṇā pakṣisattama /
GP12garup3_u:2134: nīcaiḥ samāgamo nindyastathaiva ca vipattidaḥ // GarP_3,17.15 //
GP12garup3_u:2139: matsevāṃ ca kimarthaṃ vai hyācariṣyanti suvratāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2141: purā vayaṃ tu śaptāḥ sma brahmaṇā krodharūpiṇā /
GP12garup3_u:2144: samāpsyathānyagātvaṃ cetyevaṃ śaptā ha bhāmini // GarP_3,17.20 //
GP12garup3_u:2149: śivanāmno dvijasyaiva gṛhe sā tu kumārikā /
GP12garup3_u:2151: tapasā toṣitā viṣṇuḥ śiva saṃjño mahāprabhuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2154: yatonayā ca pārvatyā preritā eva sarvaśaḥ // GarP_3,17.25 //
GP12garup3_u:2156: ataḥ sā pārvātī śreṣṭhā brahmadehe na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,17.26 //
GP12garup3_u:2159: rudrāntaḥ stho hariścaiva vahaṃ dattvā striyāṃ prabhuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2162: indraseneti saṃjñāṃ ca labdhvā tāśca tapovanam // GarP_3,17.29 //
GP12garup3_u:2167: taddehena visṛṣṭā sā babhūva draupadīti ca /
GP12garup3_u:2168: yasmātsā drupadājjātā tasmātsā draupadī smṛtā // GarP_3,17.32 //
GP12garup3_u:2170: kṛṣṇavarṇā yatastasmātsā kṛṣṇā bhūtale smṛtā // GarP_3,17.33 //
GP12garup3_u:2174: abhimānastadaiva syāttasyā eva na cānyathā // GarP_3,17.35 //
GP12garup3_u:2176: abhimānaśca nāstyeva svāpa eva ratāḥ sadā // GarP_3,17.36 //
GP12garup3_u:2178: bhāratyāśca tathā śacyā abhimānadvayaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,17.37 //
GP12garup3_u:2180: sarvāsāṃ svāpa eva syānnātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,17.38 //
GP12garup3_u:2182: bhāratīṃ ramate nityaṃ śāmalāṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ // GarP_3,17.39 //
GP12garup3_u:2183: suṃdareṇa ca rūpeṇa praviṣṭo nakule marut /
GP12garup3_u:2184: ramate bhāratīṃ nityaṃ nakulaścāpyuṣāṃ khaga // GarP_3,17.40 //
GP12garup3_u:2186: draupadīṃ ramate nityaṃ sahadevotpayuṣāṃ khaga // GarP_3,17.41 //
GP12garup3_u:2187: śacyādyā draupadīdehe nāpuḥ saṃgaṃ ca mārutaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2190: manujasya ca dehasya tāsāṃ saṃgaṃ cintayet // GarP_3,17.43 //
GP12garup3_u:2191: aparokṣavatīnāṃ tu tāsāṃ lepo na sarvathā /
GP12garup3_u:2193: ramaṇaṃ cakrurevaṃ tā ato doṣo na vidyate /
GP12garup3_u:2194: ekasmindivase vīndra dharmo vāyuśca tāvubhau // GarP_3,17.45 //
GP12garup3_u:2198: na jānantyeva martyāṃstu teṣu deheṣu te punaḥ // GarP_3,17.47 //
GP12garup3_u:2199: nīrakṣīravivikaṃ ca haṃso vetti na cāparaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2200: ataḥ svabhartṛsaṃyogaṃ kṛṣṇādehena cintayet kṛṣṇādehenyagāmitvaṃ naiva cintyaṃ khageśvara // GarP_3,17.48 //
GP12garup3_u:2201: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhāratyā viśiṣṭadeha saṃprāptyai kāraṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2208: hare ramāyāśca yasya svasminnidrāṃ prakurvataḥ // GarP_3,18.2 //
GP12garup3_u:2211: hare sadā namāmi tvāṃ bahu janmani janmani /
GP12garup3_u:2212: evaṃ buddhā tu garuḍo hyabhūcca śayanaṃ hareḥ // GarP_3,18.4 //
GP12garup3_u:2214: kālanāmā ca garuḍo vāhanārthaṃ harerabhūt // GarP_3,18.5 //
GP12garup3_u:2216: ahaṃ kārātmako rudraḥ samabhūtsovituṃ harim // GarP_3,18.6 //
GP12garup3_u:2218: gāyatrībhāratībhyāṃ te trayaḥ śataguṇā varāḥ // GarP_3,18.7 //
GP12garup3_u:2219: śeṣaḥ sa eva vijñeyo bhakto nārāyaṇasya ca /
GP12garup3_u:2223: rāmasya sevāṃ kartuṃ sā sītā bhūmyāṃ khagādhipa /
GP12garup3_u:2228: na vīndrāsyāvatārosti bhūmyāṃ cājñā tathā hareḥ // GarP_3,18.12 //
GP12garup3_u:2234: ataḥ sadāśaivo jñeyo na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ // GarP_3,18.15 //
GP12garup3_u:2240: ataḥ sadāśivo jñeyo na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ // GarP_3,18.18 //
GP12garup3_u:2242: ataḥ sadāśivo jñeyo na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ // GarP_3,18.19 //
GP12garup3_u:2244: ato rudrastapaḥ saṃjñāmavāpa ca khagottama // GarP_3,18.20 //
GP12garup3_u:2248: durvāsāstu sa vijñeyo mānabhaṅgāya bhūbhṛtām // GarP_3,18.22 //
GP12garup3_u:2251: īśānakoṇe saṃsthito yastu rudro hyavāpa vai vāmadeveti saṃjñām /
GP12garup3_u:2252: svavāmabhāge saṃsthitaṃ caiva vāyustaṃ yogyabhaktaṃ sevate sarvadaiva // GarP_3,18.24 //
GP12garup3_u:2253: ato rudro vāmadeveti saṃjñā mavāpa śiṣṭatvamathottamatvam /
GP12garup3_u:2254: kālātmakatvaṃ ca balātmakatvamavāpa rudro na tu suṃdaratvataḥ // GarP_3,18.25 //
GP12garup3_u:2255: sadā rudro tripurasthāṃśca daityānviṣṇuduho hantu kāmo mahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:2256: aghorarūpaṃ dhṛpavānrudra eva tatastvaghoreti sa āpa saṃjñām // GarP_3,18.26 //
GP12garup3_u:2257: sevāṃ kartuṃ tvicchato daityasaṃghānkiñcitkālaṃ tapasā kliśyamānān /
GP12garup3_u:2258: varāndātuṃ sadya evābhijātaḥ sadyojātetyeva saṃjñāmavāpa // GarP_3,18.27 //
GP12garup3_u:2259: uroḥ putrastu aurvaśca rudra eva prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2269: dṛṣṭvā svabiṃbaṃ suguṇaistu pūrṇaṃ saṃkarṣaṇākhyaṃ natapādapadm /
GP12garup3_u:2271: dṛṣṭvā hariṃ pulakāṅgastu rudraḥ sabhāṣpacakṣū ruddhakaṇṭhaśca hṛṣṭaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2272: anādyanantabrahmakalpeṣu naiva kṛtaṃ yayā smaraṇaṃ sarvadaiva // GarP_3,18.33 //
GP12garup3_u:2273: pādāravinde sunakhairvibhūṣite dṛṣṭe mayā kena puṇyena deva /
GP12garup3_u:2274: dṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā pādapadmaṃ murāreḥ punaḥ punā ruddhakaṇṭho babhūva // GarP_3,18.34 //
GP12garup3_u:2275: ruroda rudro bhayakaṃpitāṅgaḥ kathaṃ punardarśanaṃ me prabhoḥ syāt /
GP12garup3_u:2276: mukunda nārāyaṇa viśvamūrte vāgindriyeṇa stavanaṃ me kathaṃ syāt // GarP_3,18.35 //
GP12garup3_u:2277: maddarśanaṃ sarvadā pāpuyuktaṃ tathā madvāk sarvadā pāpayuktā /
GP12garup3_u:2278: maddarśanaṃ sarvadā strīṣu saktamabhūcca te darśanaṃ me hyasaktam // GarP_3,18.36 //
GP12garup3_u:2279: āsaktatā putradārādikānāṃ samyak śaktistavane nāsti viṣṇoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2280: viṣṇustutau nāvakāśosti vāco dṛṣṭohaṃ tvaṃ kena puṇyena deva // GarP_3,18.37 //
GP12garup3_u:2281: anantakarṇeśa sucandrasaṃjña śrotreṇa nityaṃ na kathā śrutā te /
GP12garup3_u:2282: śrutā mayā bahudhā lokavārtā dṛṣṭo mayā tvaṃ kena puṇyena deva // GarP_3,18.38 //
GP12garup3_u:2283: dṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā pādapīṭhaṃ hareśca punaḥ punā ruddhaṅkaṭho babhūva /
GP12garup3_u:2284: ruroda rudro bhayakaṃpitāṅgaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ śravaṇaṃ syātkathāyāḥ // GarP_3,18.39 //
GP12garup3_u:2286: sadā na liptaṃ ca bhujairviliptaṃ tanmūtraviṣṭhādimakardamāmbubhiḥ // GarP_3,18.40 //
GP12garup3_u:2288: anarpitairvastragandhādikaiśca dṛṣṭo mayā kena puṇyena deva // GarP_3,18.41 //
GP12garup3_u:2289: spṛṣṭvāspṛṣṭvā harinirmālyagandhaṃ punaḥ punā ruddhakaṇṭho babhūva /
GP12garup3_u:2290: ruroda rudro bhayakaṃpitāṅgaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ sparśanaṃ syātsadā me // GarP_3,18.42 //
GP12garup3_u:2291: nṛsiṃha nāsāsthita nāsikeśa mannāsayā kvāpi supadmasaurabham /
GP12garup3_u:2292: nāghrātamitthaṃ punarāghrātameva hyanarpitaṃ gandhapuṣpādikaṃ ca // GarP_3,18.43 //
GP12garup3_u:2293: sunāsikaṃ suṣṭhudantaṃ murāre dṛṣṭaṃ mukhaṃ kena puṇyena deva /
GP12garup3_u:2294: ghrātvā ghrātvā viṣṇunirmālyagandhaṃ punaḥ punā ruddhakaṇṭho babhūva // GarP_3,18.44 //
GP12garup3_u:2295: ruroda rudro bhayakaṃpitāṅgo jighrāmi nirmālyamidaṃ kathaṃ te /
GP12garup3_u:2296: jihvāsthito jihva saṃjño murāre jihvendriyeṇāpi tathārpitaṃ ca // GarP_3,18.45 //
GP12garup3_u:2298: yo snāti nityaṃ purato murāreḥ prāpnoti yajñāyutakoṭipuṇyam // GarP_3,18.46 //
GP12garup3_u:2299: etādṛśaṃ tava naivedyaśeṣaṃ na bhuktaṃ vai sarvadādityarūpam /
GP12garup3_u:2300: anarpitaṃ tava devasya viṣṇorbhuktaṃ mayā bahuvāraṃ mukunda // GarP_3,18.47 //
GP12garup3_u:2301: pādāravinde nārpitaṃ bhakṣyabhojyaṃ dṛṣṭo mayā kena puṇyena deva /
GP12garup3_u:2302: bhuktvābhuktvā harinairavedyajātaṃ sukhaṃ tvadīyaṃ ramayā lālitaṃ ca // GarP_3,18.48 //
GP12garup3_u:2303: dyubhvāśrayaṃ tava mūrdhānamāhuḥ kirīṭayuktaṃ kuṭilaiḥ kuntalaiśca /
GP12garup3_u:2306: evaṃ subhaktyā ca ruroda rudro dṛṣṭvā hariṃ survaguṇaiḥ saṃpūrṇam // GarP_3,18.50 //
GP12garup3_u:2308: dṛṣṭaṃ mayā dayayā vāsudeva drakṣye kathaṃ punaritthaṃ ruroda // GarP_3,18.51 //
GP12garup3_u:2309: dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tvarivale bhavināśiśaṅkhacakrādikaistrijagatāpi ca deva pūrṇam /
GP12garup3_u:2310: etādṛśaṃ tvadudaraṃ ca kathaṃ rameśa drakṣye punaḥ punarahaṃ tviti saṃruroda // GarP_3,18.52 //
GP12garup3_u:2311: ānandapūrṇa nakhapūrṇa sukeśapūrṇa lomādipūrṇa guṇapūrṇa sughoṇapūrṇa /
GP12garup3_u:2312: vakṣaḥ sthalaṃ tava vibhostu viśālabhūtaṃ sadbhūṣaṇaṃ vimalakaustubhaśobhi lakṣmyā // GarP_3,18.53 //
GP12garup3_u:2313: sukomalaṃ śrītulasyāstathaiva supuṣpitaṃ canda naiścarcitaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2314: etādṛśaṃ tava vakṣaḥ sthalaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tava kāruṇyadṛṣṭyā // GarP_3,18.54 //
GP12garup3_u:2315: punaḥ punardarśanaṃ me kathaṃ syādevaṃ rudraḥ sa ca bhaktyā ruroda /
GP12garup3_u:2316: atastūrurnāma saṃprāpya rudrastatputrobhūddaurvasaṃjñaḥ sa eva // GarP_3,18.55 //
GP12garup3_u:2317: yasmādrudaṃ corvaritaṃ vai cakāra tasmātsa rudrastvaurvasaṃjño babhūva /
GP12garup3_u:2318: aurvastu lokānmokṣayogyāṃśca dṛṣṭvā hyatyantaṃ vai viṣayeṣveva niṣṭhān // GarP_3,18.56 //
GP12garup3_u:2319: stūddaiva caurvo viṣṇupādāravidaṃ smṛtvāsmṛtvā ruddhakaṇṭho babhūva /
GP12garup3_u:2320: te pāpiṣṭhāḥ pāparūpānbhajanto dinedine durviṣayānkadindriyaiḥ // GarP_3,18.57 //
GP12garup3_u:2321: kadā caitānheyabuddhyā vimuñce na jānehaṃ ceti samyag ruroda /
GP12garup3_u:2322: ete hi mūrkhā viṣayānarthalabdhyai kurvanti yatnaṃ paramādareṇa // GarP_3,18.58 //
GP12garup3_u:2323: kadindriyārthaṃ hi dhanādikaṃ ca tyajanti ca sarve viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2325: smṛtvāsmṛtvā vāsudevasya māyāṃ ruroda caurvo bhayakaṃpitāṅgaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2326: atīva kaṣṭena ca lokavṛttyā śritā dainyaṃ svīyakāryaṃ vihāya // GarP_3,18.60 //
GP12garup3_u:2327: atīva dainyena dhanādikaṃ ca saṃpādya sarve 'pi supāpaśīlāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2328: kaṣṭārjitaṃ dravyadhanādikaṃ ca tyajanti sarve paśavo vyarthameva // GarP_3,18.61 //
GP12garup3_u:2329: satpātrabhūte viṣṇubuddhyā kadāpi tyajanti naite māyayā vai murāreḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2330: eṣāmāyurvyarthamāhurmahāntaḥ kathaṃ naṣṭā iti samyagruroda // GarP_3,18.62 //
GP12garup3_u:2331: eṣāmāyurvyarthamevaṃ gataṃ ca eṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā yauvanaṃ tu dhruvaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2332: skandhasthamṛtyurhasate kṛṣṇa viṣṇo taṃ vai na jānanti vimūḍhacetasaḥ // GarP_3,18.63 //
GP12garup3_u:2333: gṛhaṃ madīyaṃ śatavarṣaṃ ca jīvetputrā madīyā śavatavarṣaṃ tathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2334: ahaṃ ca jīve śatavarṣaṃ sukhena madīyabhāryāpi sulakṣaṇā'ste // GarP_3,18.64 //
GP12garup3_u:2335: gāvaśca me saṃti sadugdhapūrṇā mitrāṇi me saṃti mudā hi yuktāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2336: dāsye sutaṃ vāraṇārthaṃ tu vadhvai putrīṃ vivāhārthamahaṃ dadāmi // GarP_3,18.65 //
GP12garup3_u:2337: dāsye cāhaṃ satsu putrīṃ dhanaṃ vā dāsye cāhaṃ dhanikeṣveva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2338: adṛṣṭaśūnyān bhagavānvāsudevo dṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā hasate sarvadaiva // GarP_3,18.66 //
GP12garup3_u:2339: nāhaṃ kariṣye śravaṇaṃ kathāyā madbhāgyanā śaśca bhaviṣyatīti /
GP12garup3_u:2340: nāhaṃ hariṃ pūjayiṣye sadaiva putrādināśaśca bhaviṣyatīti // GarP_3,18.67 //
GP12garup3_u:2342: etādṛśānmūrkhajanāṃśca dṛṣṭvā ruroda caurvo vāsudevaikaniṣṭhaḥ // GarP_3,18.68 //
GP12garup3_u:2343: atastvaurvo rudrarūpī khagendra jānīhi nityaṃ kṛṣṇasuśikṣitārthaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2344: yadā satī dakṣaputrī khagendra dakṣādhvare svaśarīraṃ visṛjya // GarP_3,18.69 //
GP12garup3_u:2346: ūrdhvaretā bhavetyuktvā ūrdhvaretā babhūva ha // GarP_3,18.70 //
GP12garup3_u:2347: pāṇigrāhaṃ rudradevo mahātmā yadā himādreḥ kanyakāyāścakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2348: tasyāṃ paraṃ laṃpaṭaḥ saṃbabhūva ato rudraḥ parasaṃjñāmavāpa // GarP_3,18.71 //
GP12garup3_u:2350: samā ete mokṣakāle sṛtau ca śatairguṇairnyūnabhūtāśca tābhyām // GarP_3,18.72 //
GP12garup3_u:2353: nirṇetuṃ jñānināṃ yadvajjñāpanārthaṃ tathā mama // GarP_3,18.73 //
GP12garup3_u:2354: brūhi śiṣyāya dayayā uddhartuṃ māṃ ca sarvadā /
GP12garup3_u:2355: pūrṇakāmasya te kṛṣṇa kā spṛhā vidyate prabho // GarP_3,18.74 //
GP12garup3_u:2357: uvāca kṛpayā kṛṣṇaḥ prasannaḥ kamalekṣaṇaḥ // GarP_3,18.75 //
GP12garup3_u:2359: gāyatryāśca śatānanda ekānandastu vedhasaḥ etādṛśaḥ śatānando brahmaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,18.76 //
GP12garup3_u:2362: evaṃ tu nirṇayo jñeya ānandasya sadā khaga /
GP12garup3_u:2364: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe rudrarodanahetvānanantānandatāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2369: brahmāṇī bhāratī cobhe adhike devasattama // GarP_3,19.1 //
GP12garup3_u:2373: sarveṣāṃ caiva pūrveṣāmavekṣyaiva hare vibho // GarP_3,19.3 //
GP12garup3_u:2376: nirṇayaṃ brṛhi govinda sarvajñosi na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2384: yathānande tathā jñāne viṣṇau bhaktau balādhike // GarP_3,19.8 //
GP12garup3_u:2385: sarve guṇaiḥ śataguṇāḥ krameṇoktā nu te 'khilāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2386: bhāratyāśca śataṃ jñānaṃ sukhaṃ bhaktibalādhike // GarP_3,19.9 //
GP12garup3_u:2388: evaṃ jñānaṃ śataṃ jñeyaṃ mārute nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,19.10 //
GP12garup3_u:2389: bhāratyāśca śataṃ jñānaṃ balaṃ ca samudāhṛtam /
GP12garup3_u:2390: evameva ca vāyośca jñānaṃ caivamiti sphuṭam // GarP_3,19.11 //
GP12garup3_u:2394: ānandatāratamyaṃ ca yathoktaṃ tu mayā tava // GarP_3,19.13 //
GP12garup3_u:2395: tathaiva jānīhi khaga nānyathā tu kathañcana /
GP12garup3_u:2396: ahaṃ vijānāmi mayi sthitān guṇānsarvairviśeṣaiśca khagendra saṃyutān // GarP_3,19.14 //
GP12garup3_u:2397: susūkṣmarūpāṃśca sadā khagendra mayāpyadṛṣṭo nāsti nāstyeva kaścit // GarP_3,19.15 //
GP12garup3_u:2398: sarvāvatāreṣvapi vidyamānaṃ hariṃ vijānāti ramāpi devī // GarP_3,19.16 //
GP12garup3_u:2400: susūkṣmarūpānsā vijānāti devī brahmādibhyo matprasādādhikaṃ ca // GarP_3,19.17 //
GP12garup3_u:2401: svātmasvarūpaṃ pravijānāti devī susūkṣmarūpaṃ suviśeṣaiśca yuktam /
GP12garup3_u:2402: svānyaṃ prapañcaṃ pravijānāti lakṣmīstathāpyaśeṣaiḥ suviśeṣaiśca yuktam // GarP_3,19.18 //
GP12garup3_u:2404: śrotraṃ na jānāti harerguṇāṃśca susūkṣmarūpāṃśca viśeṣasaṃyutān // GarP_3,19.19 //
GP12garup3_u:2405: spaṣṭasvarūpeṇa yathā viduḥ surā muktvā brahmāṇaṃ na tathā tepyamuktāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2406: svātmānamanyacca sadā viśeṣaryuktaṃ vijānāti vidhiśca mārutaḥ // GarP_3,19.20 //
GP12garup3_u:2407: vāṇī vijānāti harerguṇāṃśca svayaṃbhuvo naiva tāvadviśeṣān /
GP12garup3_u:2408: traiguṇyarūpātparataḥ sadaiva paśyedviṣṇuṃ kṛṣṇarūpaṃ khagendra // GarP_3,19.21 //
GP12garup3_u:2409: śeṣo rudro vīndra etaiśca sarve tamo mātre pravijānanti saṃstham /
GP12garup3_u:2410: vāṇīdṛṣṭānsaviśeṣān guṇāṃste jānanti no satyamevoktamaṅga // GarP_3,19.22 //
GP12garup3_u:2411: umā suparṇā vāruṇī ceti tisraḥ sahaiva taḥ pravijānanti sustham /
GP12garup3_u:2412: harerviśeṣānarudra dṛṣṭānkhagendra jānanti naitāḥ kvāpi deśe ca kāle // GarP_3,19.23 //
GP12garup3_u:2413: indrādayaḥ pravijānanti vīndra ahaṅkāre vyāptarūpaṃ hariṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2414: dakṣādyā vai buddhitattve sthitaṃ taṃ jānanti te somasūryādayaśca // GarP_3,19.24 //
GP12garup3_u:2415: viṣṇuṃ hariṃ bhūtatattve sthitaṃ ca ye cānye ca pravijānanti nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2416: anye ca paśyanti yathā svayogyamaṇḍāntarasthaṃ harirūpaṃ khagendra // GarP_3,19.25 //
GP12garup3_u:2417: kecitprapaśyanti hareśca rūpaṃ tvadīyahṛtsthaṃ hṛdi kecitsadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2418: evaṃprakāraṃ pravijānīhi vīndra hyatho śṛṇu tvaṃmama bhāryāḥ ṣaḍetāḥ // GarP_3,19.26 //
GP12garup3_u:2419: rukmiṇyādyāḥ ṣaṇmahiṣyo mamaśrīrnīlā ca yā mama bhāryā khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:2420: sarge pūrvasminhavyavāhasya putrī tāstā bhaje sadya evā viśeṣāt // GarP_3,19.27 //
GP12garup3_u:2421: kanyaiva sā kṛṣṇapatnī ca kāmāṃstāṃstān bhajenmanasā cintitāṃśca /
GP12garup3_u:2422: atīva yatnaṃ kavyavāhaṃ khagendra pitṛṣvekaḥ sarvadā vai cakāra // GarP_3,19.28 //
GP12garup3_u:2423: tathaiva sā naiva bhartāramāpa yatastu sā kṛṣṇaniṣṭhaikacittā // GarP_3,19.29 //
GP12garup3_u:2424: tadābravītkavyavāhaśca putrariṃ patiṃ kimarthaṃ necchasi mūḍhabuddhe /
GP12garup3_u:2425: tadābravītkavyavāhaṃ ca puttrī hariṃ vinā sarvaguṇopapanne /
GP12garup3_u:2426: janmanyasmin bhartṛtā nāsti deva yato bhartā hariravaika eva // GarP_3,19.30 //
GP12garup3_u:2427: yato loke sustriyaḥ sarva eva saṃdā jñeyā vidhavāste hi nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2428: anādi nityaṃ bhuvanaikasāraṃ susuṃdaraṃ mokṣadaṃ kāmadaṃ ca // GarP_3,19.31 //
GP12garup3_u:2429: etādṛśaṃ na vijānanti yāstu sarvāstā vai vidhavāḥ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2430: nimittabhūtaṃ bhartṛrūpaṃ ca jīvaṃ daivopetaṃ haribhaktyā vihīnam // GarP_3,19.32 //
GP12garup3_u:2431: sukaśmalaṃ navarandhraiḥ stravantaṃ durgandhayuktaṃ sarvadā kutsitaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2432: etāḥ dṛśe bhartṛjīve nu tāta prayojanaṃ nāsti kṛṣṇaṃ vihāya // GarP_3,19.33 //
GP12garup3_u:2433: devastriyo nijabhartṝnvihāyu tatra sthitaṃ prīṇayantyeva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2434: ataśca tāḥ sadhavāḥ sarvadaiva lokairvandyā nātra vicāryamasti // GarP_3,19.34 //
GP12garup3_u:2435: bhartāste haribhaktā yadi syurāsāṃ strīṇāṃ janmasāphalyameva /
GP12garup3_u:2437: yadbhartāro haribhaktā na saṃti tābhistyājyaṃ svīyagātraṃ bhṛśaṃ hi /
GP12garup3_u:2438: svabhartṛtaṃ kṛṣṇarūpaṃ hariṃ ca smṛtvā samyag yadi gātraṃ tyajeyuḥ // GarP_3,19.36 //
GP12garup3_u:2439: tadā naiva hyātmahatyādidoṣāḥ strīṇāmevaṃ nirṇayoyaṃ hi śāstre /
GP12garup3_u:2440: yadbhartāro na vijānanti viṣṇuṃ tāsāṃ saṃgo naiva kāryaḥ kadāpi // GarP_3,19.37 //
GP12garup3_u:2442: kalau yuge durlabhā viṣṇubhaktā harebhaktirdurlabhā sarvadaiva // GarP_3,19.38 //
GP12garup3_u:2443: hareḥ kathā durlabhā martyaloke harerdīkṣā durlabhā durlabhā ca /
GP12garup3_u:2444: harestattve nirṇayo durlabho hi harerdāsaiḥ saṃgamo durlabhaśca // GarP_3,19.39 //
GP12garup3_u:2445: pradakṣiṇaṃ durlabhaṃ vai murārernamaskāro durlabho vai kalau ca /
GP12garup3_u:2446: tadbhaktānāṃ pālanaṃ durlabhaṃ ca sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ durlabhaṃ hyannadānam // GarP_3,19.40 //
GP12garup3_u:2447: tantroktapūjā durlabhā vai murārernāmagraho durlabhaścava viṣṇoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2448: suvaiṣṇavānāṃ pujanaṃ durlabhaṃ hi sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ durlabhaṃ ca // GarP_3,19.41 //
GP12garup3_u:2449: śālagrāmasparśanaṃ durlabhaṃ ca sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ darśanaṃ durlabhaṃ hi /
GP12garup3_u:2450: gosparśanaṃ durlabhaṃ martyaloke sadgāyanaṃ durlabhaṃ sadguruñca // GarP_3,19.42 //
GP12garup3_u:2451: sadbhāryāḥ satputrakā durlabhā hi śeṣācalasthasya hareśca darśanam /
GP12garup3_u:2452: sudurlabhaṃ raṅganāthasya tīre kāveryā vai darśanaṃ viṣṇupadyāḥ // GarP_3,19.43 //
GP12garup3_u:2453: kāñcīkṣetre varadarājasya sevā sudurlabhā darśanaṃ caiva loke /
GP12garup3_u:2454: sudurlabhaṃ darśanaṃ rāmasetoḥ sudurlabhā madhvaśāstre ca śaktiḥ // GarP_3,19.44 //
GP12garup3_u:2455: bhīmātīre saṃsthitasyāpi viṣṇoḥ sudurlabhaṃ darśanaṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2456: revātīre saṃsthitasyāpi viṣṇorgayākṣetre viṣṇupādasya caiva // GarP_3,19.45 //
GP12garup3_u:2457: tathā badrau saṃsthita syāpi viṣṇoḥ sudurlabhaṃ martyaloke sthitānām /
GP12garup3_u:2458: śeṣācale śrīnivāsāśrame ca tapasvino durlabhā martyaloke // GarP_3,19.46 //
GP12garup3_u:2459: prayāgākhye mādhavasyāpi nityaṃ sudarśanaṃ durlabhaṃ vai nṛṇāṃ hi // GarP_3,19.47 //
GP12garup3_u:2461: evamuktvā sā pitaraṃ yayau śeṣācalaṃ prati // GarP_3,19.48 //
GP12garup3_u:2463: tatrasthaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā natvā mahāsatī // GarP_3,19.49 //
GP12garup3_u:2467: gartabhūte ca ekānte cacāra tapa uttamam // GarP_3,19.51 //
GP12garup3_u:2471: tvameva mātā ca pitā tvameva bhartā ca sakhātvameva /
GP12garup3_u:2472: tvameva putraśca gururgarīyānmitraṃ svasā tvaṃ mama vallabhaśca // GarP_3,19.53 //
GP12garup3_u:2473: anādyananteṣvapi janmasu prabho vicāryamāṇā na vijānepyahaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2474: etai hi sarve ca nimittamātrataḥ pitrādayastvaṃ hyanimittamātrataḥ // GarP_3,19.54 //
GP12garup3_u:2475: ato murāreśca tavaiva bhāryā bhūyāsamityeva tadā vrataṃ me /
GP12garup3_u:2476: duḥ saṃgamātrādisamāgamaṃ na saṃsiddhirityeva vadānyamūrte // GarP_3,19.55 //
GP12garup3_u:2477: tvaddūṣakāṇāṃ tava dāsavarya vidūṣakāṇāṃ darśanaṃ chindhi deva /
GP12garup3_u:2478: gurudruhāṃ darśanaṃ chindhi viṣṇo bhaktadruhāṃ mitratāṃ chindhi kṛṣṇa // GarP_3,19.56 //
GP12garup3_u:2479: tava dhrugbhirbhāṣaṇaṃ chindhi deva tvaṃ saṃgamaṃ dehi padāravinde /
GP12garup3_u:2480: śrīśailavāsāya namonamaste namonamaḥ śrīnivāsāya tubhyam // GarP_3,19.57 //
GP12garup3_u:2481: svāmin parāvara rameśa nidānamūrte kālo mahānapi gataśca nidarśanante /
GP12garup3_u:2483: kathaṃ mama syāttava darśanaṃ prabho sarvaiśca doṣaiśca susaṃgatāyāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2484: dāsyāspadāyāstava dāsadāsyāḥ prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa // GarP_3,19.59 //
GP12garup3_u:2488: hariṇodīritaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā prāha smitānanā // GarP_3,19.61 //
GP12garup3_u:2490: ahaṃ hi bhāryā bhūyāsaṃ tava mādhava suṃdara // GarP_3,19.62 //
GP12garup3_u:2493: ahaṃ kumāri subhage kṛṣṇajanmani bhūtale // GarP_3,19.63 //
GP12garup3_u:2494: bhavāmi tava bhartāhaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup3_u:2495: evamuktā sutā kanyā puraṇyarāśiṃ hariṃ param // GarP_3,19.64 //
GP12garup3_u:2505: dehaṃ tatraiva saṃtyajya kumārī caiva putrikā // GarP_3,19.68 //
GP12garup3_u:2506: kumbha kasya gṛhe jātā nīlā nāmnā tu sā smṛtā /
GP12garup3_u:2508: kalpavāhaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ pitṝṇāṃ prathamaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2512: tato nāgnijito rājño gṛhe jātā kumārikā // GarP_3,19.71 //
GP12garup3_u:2516: baddhvā vṛṣānnṛpāñjitvā prāptā nīlā mahākhaga // GarP_3,19.73 //
GP12garup3_u:2517: kuṃbhakasya sutā nīlā dehasthāḥ prāviśan bhṛśam /
GP12garup3_u:2519: bhūmau dvidhā saṃprajātā kumāryeva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2521: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe nīlāvivāhanirṇayo nāmaikonaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2525: yā pūrvasarge nalasaṃjñasya vīndra putrī bhūtvā viṣṇupatnī sakāmā /
GP12garup3_u:2526: pradakṣiṇaṃ bhramaṇaṃ vai cakāra guṇena bhadrā bhadrasaṃjñā babhūva // GarP_3,20.1 //
GP12garup3_u:2527: kanyābhāve saṃsthitāṃ bhadrasaṃjñāṃ pitā nalastvabravīttāṃ sa paśyan /
GP12garup3_u:2528: bhadre kimarthaṃ gātrapīḍāṃ karoṣi phalaṃ hi tannandini me vadasva // GarP_3,20.2 //
GP12garup3_u:2530: śṛṇutvaṃ me tāta namaskriyādeḥ phalaṃ vaktuṃ kā samarthā bhavecca // GarP_3,20.3 //
GP12garup3_u:2531: tathāpyahaṃ tava vakṣyāmi tāta yathāśaktyā śṛṇu samyagghitāya /
GP12garup3_u:2532: sadā harimarma nātho dayālurahaṃ harestava dāsānudāsī /
GP12garup3_u:2533: māṃ pāhi viṣṇostava vande pade ityuktvā praṇāmaṃ cākaroddaṇḍarūpam // GarP_3,20.4 //
GP12garup3_u:2534: hareḥ praṇāmaṃ tviti kartavyaśūnyaṃ vyarthaṃ tamāhurjñāninastacchṛṇu tvam /
GP12garup3_u:2536: yathā prasanno vandanāddevaddeva stathā na tuṣṭaḥ pūjanātkarmataśca /
GP12garup3_u:2537: yathā nāmasmaraṇādvandanādvā pāpānniyacchetu tathā na cānyaiḥ // GarP_3,20.6 //
GP12garup3_u:2538: dehaṃ tu ye poṣayantyeva tāta hareḥ praṇāmaiḥ śūnyabhūtaṃ ca puṣṭam /
GP12garup3_u:2539: tadevamāhurvyarthameveti tāta tatpoṣakāṇāṃ narake duḥ khamāhuḥ // GarP_3,20.7 //
GP12garup3_u:2540: yamo 'pi taṃ tatra ulūkhale tu nidhāya piṣṭaṃ sukhalaiḥ karoti /
GP12garup3_u:2541: yo vā paraṃ na karotyeva tāta pradakṣiṇaṃ devadevasya viṣṇoḥ // GarP_3,20.8 //
GP12garup3_u:2542: tasyaiva pādau talayantre nidhāya yamaśca nityaṃ prakaroti piṣṭam /
GP12garup3_u:2543: eṣāṃ jihvā harikṛṣṇeti nāma na vakti nityaṃ vyarthabhūtāṃ vadanti // GarP_3,20.9 //
GP12garup3_u:2544: teṣāṃ jihvā yamaloke yamastu niṣkāsya piṣṭaṃ prakaroti nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2545: kāśīnivāsena ca kiṃ prayojanaṃ kiṃ vā prayāge maraṇena tāta // GarP_3,20.10 //
GP12garup3_u:2546: kiṃ vāraṇāgre maraṇena saukhyaṃ kiṃ vā makhādeḥ samanuṣṭhitena /
GP12garup3_u:2548: yeṣāṃ jihvāgre harināmaiva nāsti yeṣāṃ gātrairnamanaṃ nāpi viṣṇoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2549: yeṣāṃ padbhyāṃ nāsti hareḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ teṣāṃ sarvaṃ vyarthamāhurmahāntaḥ // GarP_3,20.12 //
GP12garup3_u:2551: ato viṣṇornamanaṃ kāryameva harernāmasmaraṇaṃ tāta kāryam // GarP_3,20.13 //
GP12garup3_u:2552: janma hyetaddurlabhaṃ naśvaraṃ tu yathā jalasthaṃ tattathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2553: no visvāsaṃ kuru gātre tvadīye jīveṣvapi svaḥ paraśceti tāta // GarP_3,20.14 //
GP12garup3_u:2554: sadyaḥ kṛtaṃ namanaṃ na tvadīyaṃ sadyaḥ kṛtaṃ smaraṇaṃ na tvadīyam /
GP12garup3_u:2555: kadā prāpsye maraṇaṃ tanna jāne na viśvāsaṃ kuru gātre mahātman // GarP_3,20.15 //
GP12garup3_u:2558: sāpi pradakṣiṇaṃ cakre namaskāraṃ sadā hareḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2559: evaṃ bahudinaṃ kṛtvā dhyātvā nārāyaṇaṃ param // GarP_3,20.17 //
GP12garup3_u:2567: sāvadhānamanā bhūtvā śṛṇu pakṣīndra sattama // GarP_3,20.21 //
GP12garup3_u:2570: mitraṃ hariṃ prāptukāmā sadaika tatropāyaṃ cintayāmāsadevī // GarP_3,20.22 //
GP12garup3_u:2571: hariprāptau sādhanāḥ saṃti teṣu mukhyaṃ kaciccintayāmāsa devī /
GP12garup3_u:2572: teṣāṃ madhye śravaṇaṃ śreṣṭhamāhuḥ purāṇānāṃ sāttvikānāṃ sadāpi // GarP_3,20.23 //
GP12garup3_u:2573: viṣṇorutkarṣo vartate yatra vāyostathotkarṣaḥ sajjanānāṃ purāṇe /
GP12garup3_u:2574: śrāddhaṃ sadā viṣṇubuddhyā sadaiva nānyacchrāvyaṃ sādhanaṃ tatra caiva // GarP_3,20.24 //
GP12garup3_u:2575: yasmindine śravaṇaṃ nāsti viṣṇosteṣāṃ janma vyarthamāhuḥ kathāyām /
GP12garup3_u:2576: snāna japaḥ pañcayajñaṃ vrataṃ ca iṣṭāpūrte kṛcchracāndro ca dattam // GarP_3,20.25 //
GP12garup3_u:2577: sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca dīkṣā kathāṃ vinā samyaganuṣṭhitāṃ vai /
GP12garup3_u:2578: yairna śrutaṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ sasaṃpradāyairgurubhiḥ saṃyutaiśca // GarP_3,20.26 //
GP12garup3_u:2579: yairna śrutaṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ yairna śrutaṃ brahmakāṇḍaṃ purāṇam /
GP12garup3_u:2580: teṣāṃ janma vyarthamāhurmamahāntastasmācchrāvyā harivārtā sadaiva // GarP_3,20.27 //
GP12garup3_u:2581: na yatra govindakathāmahānadī na yatra nārāyaṇapādasaṃśrayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2582: na yatra viṣṇoḥ satataṃ vacosti na saṃvasettatkṣaṇamātraṃ kathañcit // GarP_3,20.28 //
GP12garup3_u:2583: yasmin grāme bhāgavataṃ na śāstraṃ na vartate bhāgavatā rasajñāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2584: yasmin gṛhe nāsti gītārthasāraḥ yasmin grāme nāma sahasrakaṃ vā // GarP_3,20.29 //
GP12garup3_u:2585: tayo rasajñā yatra na santi tatra na saṃvasetkṣaṇamātraṃ kathañcit /
GP12garup3_u:2586: yasmin dine divyakathā ca viṣṇorna vāsti jantostasya cāyurvṛthaiva // GarP_3,20.30 //
GP12garup3_u:2587: garbhe gate nātra vicāryamasti tanmanyate durlabhaṃ martyaloke /
GP12garup3_u:2588: karṇaṃ kalpairbhūṣitaṃ suṃdaraṃ ca na suṃdaraṃ cāhurāryā rasajñāḥ // GarP_3,20.31 //
GP12garup3_u:2589: viṣṇoḥ kathākhyābharaṇaiśca yuktaṃ tadeva karṇaṃ suṃdaraṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2590: tasmātsadā bhāgavatārthasāraṃ śṛṇvanti ye satataṃ vācayanti // GarP_3,20.32 //
GP12garup3_u:2591: teṣāṃ janma svasthamāhurmahānto mahatphalaṃ cāsti tathaiva teṣām /
GP12garup3_u:2592: soṣṇīṣakañcukayutāśca hareḥ kathāṃ vai śṛṇvanti yepi ca paṭhanti sadaiva martyāḥ // GarP_3,20.33 //
GP12garup3_u:2593: sarvepi te pūjanīyā hi loke na vai śiśre codare caiva saktāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2594: ye dākṣiṇyādarthalobhādvadanti sadā purāṇaṃ bhagavattattvasāram // GarP_3,20.34 //
GP12garup3_u:2595: pracchādayante tattvagopyāni ye tu teṣāṃ gatiḥ sūryasūnuḥ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2596: ye dharmakāṇḍe karmakāṇḍe sadaiva utpādayante suruciṃ tatra nityam // GarP_3,20.35 //
GP12garup3_u:2597: maulyena ye kathayeyuḥ purāṇaṃ teṣāṃ gatiḥ sūrya sunaḥ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2598: maulyena ye bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ śṛṇvanti vai hariśāstrārthatattvam // GarP_3,20.36 //
GP12garup3_u:2599: maulyena vedādhyayanaṃ prakurvate teṣāṃ gatiḥ sūryasūnuḥ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2600: yadṛcchayā prāptadhanena ye tu saṃtuṣṭāste hyatra yogyāḥ sadaiva // GarP_3,20.37 //
GP12garup3_u:2601: dhanārjane ye tvatitṛṣṇābhiyuktāsteṣāṃ na vai bhāgavatedhikāraḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2602: matvā loke harirevati nityamantaryāmī nāsti tadanya īśaḥ // GarP_3,20.38 //
GP12garup3_u:2603: evaṃ sadā ye pravicintayanti yogakṣemaṃ bibhṛyādviṣṇureṣām /
GP12garup3_u:2604: sadvaiṣṇavānāmaśubhaṃ nāsti nāsti pradṛśyate saṃśayajñānarūpāt // GarP_3,20.39 //
GP12garup3_u:2606: atastadarthaṃ naiva yatnaṃ ca kuryāddhanārthaṃ vai haritattve ca kuryāt // GarP_3,20.40 //
GP12garup3_u:2607: ataḥ snātvā divyamantraṃ japitvā visarjayitvā viṣṇunirmālyagandham /
GP12garup3_u:2608: śucirbhūtvā bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ saṃśrāvayetsarvavettāpi nityam // GarP_3,20.41 //
GP12garup3_u:2609: karmānusāreṇa dhanārjanaṃ ca vedārjanaṃ śāstrasamārjanaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2610: bhaviṣyati śravaṇaṃ cāpi viṣṇoratyādarācchravaṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca // GarP_3,20.42 //
GP12garup3_u:2612: āsvādya tadbhāgavataṃ purāṇamānandabāṣpairyuktatā durghaṭā ca // GarP_3,20.43 //
GP12garup3_u:2613: śrutvā tattvā nāṃ nirṇayaṃ dhāraṇaṃ ca sudurghaṭaṃ cāhurāryāḥ samastam /
GP12garup3_u:2614: śrutvā tattvānāṃ dhāraṇānantaraṃ ca kāmakrudhorjāraṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca // GarP_3,20.44 //
GP12garup3_u:2615: śrutvā tattvānāṃ dhāraṇānaṃ taraṃ ta tathā yoge durghaṭaṃ saṃgataṃ ca // GarP_3,20.45 //
GP12garup3_u:2616: śrutvā tattvānāṃ dhāraṇānantaraṃ ca kāmakrudhorjāraṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2617: ete doṣā jñānapūtānapīha kurvanti saṃdehayutānsadaiva // GarP_3,20.46 //
GP12garup3_u:2618: ato hyahaṃ śravaṇaṃ satkathāyāḥ sadā kariṣye nātra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:2619: tenāpyahaṃ harināmābhivāñchā niścitya cittaṃ śravaṇe vai cakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2620: ādehamevaṃ śravaṇaṃ ca kṛtvā tyaktvā dehaṃ bhūtale saṃprajātā // GarP_3,20.47 //
GP12garup3_u:2622: sumitrā saṃjñakāyāṃ ca jātā vai mitravindikā // GarP_3,20.48 //
GP12garup3_u:2623: śravaṇena hariṃ mitraṃ prāptā sā mitravindikā /
GP12garup3_u:2624: ataḥ sā mitravindeti saṃjñayā saṃbabhūva ha // GarP_3,20.49 //
GP12garup3_u:2625: svayaṃvare mitravindā rājñāṃ madhye tu bhāminī /
GP12garup3_u:2629: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhadrākṛtabhagavatpatitvaprāpakatapaścaryādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma viṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2637: tapa ālocanaṃ proktaṃ tattvānāṃ ca vinirṇayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2639: prāyo nāma tapaḥ proktaṃ cittanigraha ucyate /
GP12garup3_u:2640: prāyaścittamiti proktaṃ na tu kṣauraṃ khageśvara // GarP_3,21.4 //
GP12garup3_u:2642: pūrvaṃ na japtaṃ divyamantraṃ mukunda taptaṃ sadā kleśadāvānalena // GarP_3,21.5 //
GP12garup3_u:2643: na vai smṛtaṃ harināmāmṛtaṃ ca sadā smṛtaṃ haridoṣādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2644: na tu smṛtaṃ haritattvāmṛtaṃ ca samyak śrutaṃ lolavārtādikaṃ ca // GarP_3,21.6 //
GP12garup3_u:2646: na vanditaṃ haripādāravindaṃ suvandito mitrapādaḥ sughoraḥ // GarP_3,21.7 //
GP12garup3_u:2647: na dṛṣṭaṃ vai dhūpadhūmrairupetaṃ harervakraṃ kuntalaiḥ saṃvṛtaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2648: putrādikaṃ lālitaṃ vai mukunda na lālitaṃ tava vakraṃ murāre // GarP_3,21.8 //
GP12garup3_u:2649: sulālitaṃ bhūṣaṇaiḥ putramitraṃ na lālitaṃ sarvapāpāpahāri /
GP12garup3_u:2650: na bhuktaṃ vai harinairavedyaśeṣaṃ mitrālaye ṣaḍrasānnaṃ ca bhuktam // GarP_3,21.9 //
GP12garup3_u:2651: supuṣpagandhā nārpitā te murāre samarpitāḥ putramitrādikebhyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2652: santaptohaṃ putramitrādikeṣu kadā drakṣye tava vaktraṃ mukunda // GarP_3,21.10 //
GP12garup3_u:2654: tathāpyabhakṣyai rasanā ca dagdhā kadā drakṣye tava vaktraṃ mukunda // GarP_3,21.11 //
GP12garup3_u:2656: na pāvitaṃ maccharīraṃ murāre kadā drakṣye tava va ktraṃ mukunda // GarP_3,21.12 //
GP12garup3_u:2658: avaiṣṇavānāṃ digdhagandhādidoṣairgātraṃ dagdhaṃ kadā hyuddhariṣye mukunda // GarP_3,21.13 //
GP12garup3_u:2659: dagdhau ca pādau mama vāsudeva na gacchantau kṣetrapathaṃ hareśca /
GP12garup3_u:2660: netre ca dagdhe mama sarvadāpi nālokitaṃ tava deva pratīkam // GarP_3,21.14 //
GP12garup3_u:2661: dagdhau ca hastau mama vāsudeva na pūjitaṃ tava viṣṇoḥ pratīkam /
GP12garup3_u:2662: mayā kṛtaṃ pāpajātaṃ murāre kadā drakṣye tava vakraṃ mukunda // GarP_3,21.15 //
GP12garup3_u:2663: madīyadoṣāngaṇayanna pūrṇa dayāṃ kuru tvaṃ suddhadāsyānmukunda /
GP12garup3_u:2664: yāvanti lomāni madīyagātre saṃti prabho sarvadorṣarvidūra // GarP_3,21.16 //
GP12garup3_u:2665: tāvanti pāpāni madīyagātre kadā drakṣye tava vaktraṃ mukunda /
GP12garup3_u:2667: sukhaṃ nāptaṃ hyapumātraṃ mukunda sevā muktā tava devasya viṣṇoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2668: itaḥ paraṃ putramitrādikaṃ ca yāsye nāhaṃ tava dāsī bhavāmi // GarP_3,21.18 //
GP12garup3_u:2669: yeye brūyuḥ putramitrādikaiśca samyak sukhaṃ jāyate martyaloke /
GP12garup3_u:2670: teṣāmāsye mūtraviṣṭhādikaṃ ca samyak sadā patitaṃ ceti jāne // GarP_3,21.19 //
GP12garup3_u:2671: mitrādīnāṃ yatkṛtaṃ dravyajātaṃ vṛthā gataṃ malarūpaṃ ca jātam /
GP12garup3_u:2672: sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ yatkṛtaṃ dravyajātaṃ hariprāpteḥ kāraṇaṃ syātsadaiva // GarP_3,21.20 //
GP12garup3_u:2673: etādṛśaṃ tattu jātaṃ mukunda alaṃ hyalaṃ tena duḥkhaṃ ca bhuktam /
GP12garup3_u:2674: saṃgaṃ dattātsajjanānāṃ sadā tvaṃ vinā ca tvaṃ durjanānāṃ ca saṃgāt // GarP_3,21.21 //
GP12garup3_u:2675: saṃgaiḥ sadā durjanānāṃ murāre gātraṃ dagdhaṃ na virāgeṇa yuktam /
GP12garup3_u:2676: etādṛśāhaṃ kāṃ gātiṃ vā mukunda yāsye na jāne dayayā māṃ ca pāhi // GarP_3,21.22 //
GP12garup3_u:2677: etādṛśo hyanutāpaḥ khagendra prāyaścittaṃ na ca kṣaurādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2678: bhānoḥ kanyā hyanutāpaṃ ca kṛtvā vicārayāmāsa hareḥ sutattvam // GarP_3,21.23 //
GP12garup3_u:2679: sarvottamo harirekaḥ sadaiva yataḥ pūrṇaḥ sarvaguṇaistataśca /
GP12garup3_u:2680: sṛṣṭau yasmājjayate viśvajātamato hariḥ sarvaguṇaiśca pūrṇaḥ // GarP_3,21.24 //
GP12garup3_u:2681: yo devānāmādya akāra eva yato brahmādyā naiva pūrṇāḥ samastāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2682: lakṣmīprasādāccirapuṇyena jāto yathāyogyaṃ pūrṇaguṇo viriñcaḥ // GarP_3,21.25 //
GP12garup3_u:2683: na lakṣmīvadguṇapūrṇo viriñco na viṣṇuvadguṇapūrṇā ramāpi /
GP12garup3_u:2684: na vāyuvadbhāratī cāpi pūrṇā na śeṣavadvāruṇī cāpi pūrṇā // GarP_3,21.26 //
GP12garup3_u:2685: na vai rudravatpārvatī pūrṇarūpā hyanyepyevaṃ naiva pūrṇāḥ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2686: ālocanāmevameṣā hi kṛtvā tapaścakre yamunāyāśca tīre // GarP_3,21.27 //
GP12garup3_u:2687: tadācāhaṃ yamunāyāśca tīraṃ pārthena sākaṃ mṛgayāṃ gataḥ khaga /
GP12garup3_u:2688: dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ tatra tapaścarantīṃ tadābruvaṃ matsakhāyaṃ ca pārtham // GarP_3,21.28 //
GP12garup3_u:2689: he pārtha śīghraṃ vraja kanyāsamīpaṃ tvaṃ pṛccha kasmādatra tapaḥ karoṣi /
GP12garup3_u:2690: evaṃ proktastatsamīpaṃ sa gatvā pṛṣṭvā caitatkāraṇaṃ śīghrameva // GarP_3,21.29 //
GP12garup3_u:2691: āgatya māmavadatphālgunoyaṃ sarvaṃ vṛttāṃntaṃ tvasau matsamīpe /
GP12garup3_u:2692: tatastvahaṃ sumuhūrte ca tasyāḥ pāṇigrahaṃ kṛtavāṃstatra samyak // GarP_3,21.30 //
GP12garup3_u:2694: pūrṇānande ramamāṇāsya nityaṃ tayā ca me kiṃ sukhaṃsyātkhagendra // GarP_3,21.31 //
GP12garup3_u:2695: mayā vivāhonugrahārthaṃ hi tasyā aṅgīkṛto na tu saukhyāya vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:2696: tathā vakṣye lakṣmaṇāyāśca rūpaṃ pāṇigrāhe kāraṇaṃ cāpi vīndrā // GarP_3,21.32 //
GP12garup3_u:2697: śṛṇuṣva tattava vakṣyāmi gopyaṃ sacchiṣyake nāsti gopyaṃ gurośca // GarP_3,21.33 //
GP12garup3_u:2698: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhagavataḥ kālindyā vivāhe hetunirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2702: yā lakṣmaṇā pūrvasarge khagendra putrī hyabhūdvahnivedasya vettuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2703: sulakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutatvādyataḥ sā sulakṣmaṇeti prathitā khagendra // GarP_3,22.1 //
GP12garup3_u:2704: yathā lakṣmīrlakṣaṇaiḥ sā supūrṇā yathā harirlakṣaṇairvai supūrṇaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2705: yathā vāyurlakṣaṇaiḥ pūrṇa eva yathā gāyatrī lakṣaṇaiḥ sā supūrṇā // GarP_3,22.2 //
GP12garup3_u:2706: yathā rudrādyā lakṣaṇairvai prapūrṇā rudrādillakṣmaṇā caiva pūrṇā /
GP12garup3_u:2707: guṇenaivaṃ dharmataḥ kiñcideva tathānusaṃdhānādvriyate nāma cāpi // GarP_3,22.3 //
GP12garup3_u:2708: tasmā dāhurlakṣmaṇetyeva sarve tallakṣaṇaṃ śṛṇu cādau khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:2709: nārāyaṇe pūrṇaguṇe rameśe dvātriṃśatsaṃkhyāni sulakṣaṇāni // GarP_3,22.4 //
GP12garup3_u:2710: saṃtyeva pakṣīndra vadāmyanu kramānmattaḥ śrutvā mokṣamāpnoti nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2712: ya etatsarvaṃ militaṃ caikameva harerviṣṇorlakṣaṇaṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2713: mukhaṃ strigdhaṃ vartulaṃ puṣṭirūpaṃ dvitīyaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ cāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,22.6 //
GP12garup3_u:2715: yaddantā vai tīkṣṇasūkṣmāśca saṃti tallakṣaṇaṃ cāhurāryāścaturtham // GarP_3,22.7 //
GP12garup3_u:2716: yasyādhare raktimā tvasti vīndra tallakṣaṇaṃ pañcamaṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2717: yasya hastā atiraktāḥ khagendra tallakṣaṇaṃ prāhurāryāśca paṣṭham // GarP_3,22.8 //
GP12garup3_u:2718: yasminnakhāḥ saṃti raktāḥ suśobhāstallakṣaṇaṃ saptamaṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2719: yasminkapole raktimā tvasti vīndra tallakṣaṇaṃ hyaṣṭamaṃ prāhurāryā // GarP_3,22.9 //
GP12garup3_u:2721: yasyo daraṃ tanturūpaṃ supuṣṭaṃ valitrayairaṅkitaṃ suṃdaraṃ ca // GarP_3,22.10 //
GP12garup3_u:2722: tallakṣaṇaṃ daśamaṃ prāhurāryā ekādaśaṃ nimnanābhiṃ tadāhuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2723: ūrudvayaṃ yasya ca māṃsalaṃ vai tallakṣaṇaṃ dvādaśaṃ prāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,22.11 //
GP12garup3_u:2724: kaṭirhi dīrghā pṛthulāsti yasya trayodaśaṃ lakṣma tadāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2725: yasyāsti muṣko supariṣṭhito vai caturdaśaṃ lakṣma tadāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,22.12 //
GP12garup3_u:2726: samunnataṃ śiśramatho hi lakṣma yasyāsti tat pañcadaśaṃ vadanti /
GP12garup3_u:2727: sutāmrakaṃ pādatalaṃ khagendra tallakṣaṇaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ prāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,22.13 //
GP12garup3_u:2728: nimnau ca gulphau saptadaśaṃ tadāhurgrī vārūpaṃ prāhuraṣṭādaśaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2729: ekonaviṃśaṃ tvakṣipadmaṃ suraktaṃ prāhurbāhuṃ jānu viṃśaṃ tathaiva // GarP_3,22.14 //
GP12garup3_u:2731: trayoviṃśaṃ sūkṣmamāsyaṃ tadāhuścaturviśaṃ suprasanne ca dṛṣṭī // GarP_3,22.15 //
GP12garup3_u:2732: hrasvaṃ liṅgaṃ mārdavaṃ cāpi vīndra tallakṣaṇaṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ vadanti /
GP12garup3_u:2733: samau ca pādau kaṭijānu corū ṣaḍviṃśamāhuśca same ca jaṅghe // GarP_3,22.16 //
GP12garup3_u:2734: samānahastau samakarṇau militvā dvātriṃśatkaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ prāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2735: dvātriṃśatkaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai mukunde dvātriṃśatkaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai ramāyām // GarP_3,22.17 //
GP12garup3_u:2736: dvātriṃśatkaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇopi tadbhāratyāḥ pravadantyeva satyam /
GP12garup3_u:2737: tathā ca śaṅkā samameva cakriṇetyevaṃ sadāmā kuru nirṇayaṃ bruve // GarP_3,22.18 //
GP12garup3_u:2738: ekasya vai lakṣaṇasyāpi viṣṇorlakṣmīrantaṃ naiva samyak prapede /
GP12garup3_u:2739: atonantairlakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutaṃ ca hariṃ cāhurlakṣaṇajñāḥ sadaiva // GarP_3,22.19 //
GP12garup3_u:2740: jānāti lakṣmīrlakṣaṇaṃ vāyurūpe svāpekṣayā hyatiriktaṃ khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:2741: svalakṣaṇāpekṣayā bhāratī tu śatairguṇairadhikā vedhasopi // GarP_3,22.20 //
GP12garup3_u:2742: khagendra tasmāllakṣaṇe sāmyacittaṃ viśvādīnāṃ sarvadā mā kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:2743: aṣṭāviṃśatiṃ prāhū rudrādikānāṃ bhrūnetrayorlakṣaṇenaiva hīnāḥ // GarP_3,22.21 //
GP12garup3_u:2744: alakṣaṇaṃ manyate yaddhi tasya durlakṣaṇaṃ naiva taccintanīyam /
GP12garup3_u:2745: aṣṭāviṃśatiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai harasya na bhāratīvaccintanīyaṃ khagendra // GarP_3,22.22 //
GP12garup3_u:2746: ato haraḥ krodharūpī sadaiva tayorabhāvātsatyamuktaṃ tathaitat /
GP12garup3_u:2747: ato dvayaṃ nāsti rudre khagendra śiśrodare kiñcidādhikyamasti // GarP_3,22.23 //
GP12garup3_u:2749: ṣaḍvaviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiścāpi yuktā vāruṇyādyā pañcaviṃśaiśca candraḥ // GarP_3,22.24 //
GP12garup3_u:2750: arthaścaturviṃśatibhiścaiva yukto nāsāvāyordvyadhikā viṃśatiśca lakṣaṇaiścaikaviṃśatyā śacī yuktā na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,22.25 //
GP12garup3_u:2760: caturbhaiḥ kṣitipāḥ proktāstribhiranye ca saṃyutāḥ // GarP_3,22.30 //
GP12garup3_u:2761: udare kiñcidādhikye hrasve pāde ca karṇayoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2762: śikhādhikyaṃ vinā vipra bhāryāyāṃ ca śivasya ca // GarP_3,22.31 //
GP12garup3_u:2765: jaṅghādhikye sahaivāṣṭau doṣāḥ śacyāḥ sadā smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2775: lalāṭe pāṇḍutā nityaṃ vāmaskandhe kare khaga /
GP12garup3_u:2778: ūrau navāñjikāromaḥ tathā pṛṣṭhe ca mastake // GarP_3,22.39 //
GP12garup3_u:2779: lalāṭe trīṇi dīrghe tu same dvau saṃprakīrtitau /
GP12garup3_u:2780: sarpākārastu yo matsyastasya śiśre prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,22.40 //
GP12garup3_u:2782: śiśrākāraśca yo matsyo gude tasya praśasyate // GarP_3,22.41 //
GP12garup3_u:2784: śvākāraścāpi matsyo vai mukhe tasya prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,22.42 //
GP12garup3_u:2785: haste tu bahurekhāḥ syurloma nāsāpuṭe smṛtam /
GP12garup3_u:2786: atidīrghaṃ tu cāṅguṣṭhaṃ kaniṣṭhaṃ cātidīrghakam // GarP_3,22.43 //
GP12garup3_u:2790: sahābhiprāya garbheṇa brahmaṇoktaṃ tava prabho // GarP_3,22.45 //
GP12garup3_u:2792: mayoktasyaiva sa vyāsaḥ kaṃbugrīvaḥ pradarśyate // GarP_3,22.46 //
GP12garup3_u:2794: ato virodho nāstyeva tathā jñānātpratīyate // GarP_3,22.47 //
GP12garup3_u:2795: saptādhikairviṃśatilakṣaṇaistu samāyutā yāḥ striyo lakṣmaṇādyāḥ // GarP_3,22.48 //
GP12garup3_u:2796: bhage netre ca haste ca stane kukṣau tathaiva ca /
GP12garup3_u:2799: ṣaḍviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiścāpi yuktā vāruṇyāḥ ṣaḍlakṣaṇaiścaiva hīnā // GarP_3,22.50 //
GP12garup3_u:2800: karṇe kukṣau nāsikākeśapāśe gulphe bhage kiñcidādhikyamasti /
GP12garup3_u:2801: indro yuktaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā khagendra sadā hīno lakṣaṇaiḥ saptasaṃkhyaiḥ // GarP_3,22.51 //
GP12garup3_u:2802: haste pāde udare karṇayośca śiśre gulphe tvadharoṣṭhedhikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2804: nābhyāṃ gulphe hanurarṅghyośca skandhe dvije netre tvadharoṣṭhedhikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2805: trayoviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiścāpi yuktā śacī tathā navadoṣaiśca yuktā // GarP_3,22.53 //
GP12garup3_u:2806: bhage keśe hyadharoṣṭhe ca karṇe jaṅghe gaṇḍe vakṣasi gulphayośca /
GP12garup3_u:2807: tathottaroṣṭhe kiñcidādhikyamasti evaṃ vijānīhi khagendrasattama // GarP_3,22.54 //
GP12garup3_u:2808: dvāviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutastu daśabhirdeṣaiḥ pravaho nāma vāyuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2810: tadviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutastu tadā doṣerdvādaśabhiśca yuktaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2815: taiśca ṣoḍaśabhiryukto dhanapo nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,22.58 //
GP12garup3_u:2821: taistrayodaśabhiścaiva saṃyuto budha eva tu // GarP_3,22.61 //
GP12garup3_u:2832: ṣadguṇaiḥ kṣitipā yuktā ṣaḍviṃśatyā ca doṣataḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2834: tribhiḥ keccittato hīnā na saṃti khagasattama /
GP12garup3_u:2835: yasminnare kṣitipe vā khagendra ādhikyaṃ yaddṛśyate lakṣaṇasya // GarP_3,22.68 //
GP12garup3_u:2836: na te narā naiva te vai kṣitīśāḥ sarve naiva hyuttamāḥ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2837: ye devā ye ca daityāśca sarvepyevaṃ khagādhipa // GarP_3,22.69 //
GP12garup3_u:2841: piturgṛhe vardhamānā sadāpi svakuṭuṃbaṃ śreṣṭhayituṃ khagendra // GarP_3,22.71 //
GP12garup3_u:2843: sadāpi ye tvanusaṃdhānena yuktā antargate tatratatra sthite ca // GarP_3,22.72 //
GP12garup3_u:2844: ajñātatve cānnapānādikaṃ ca dattaṃ saṃto vyarthamevaṃ vadanti /
GP12garup3_u:2845: hariṃ vakṣye tatratatra sthitaṃ caṃ taṃ vai śṛṇu tvādareṇādya nityam // GarP_3,22.73 //
GP12garup3_u:2846: bālo harirbālarūpeṇa kṛṣṇaḥ kṣīrādikaṃ navanītaṃ ghṛtaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2847: gṛhṇāti nityaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ vastrajātamevaṃ dadyātsarvadā viṣṇutuṣṭyai // GarP_3,22.74 //
GP12garup3_u:2848: mitrairhariḥ keśavākhyo mukundo bhuṅkte dattaṃ tvannaprānādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2849: pūrvaṃ dadyātsarvadā vai gṛhastho dhanyo bhavedanyathā vyarthameva // GarP_3,22.75 //
GP12garup3_u:2850: gṛhṇāti nityaṃ mādhavākhyo hariścetyevaṃ jñātvā deyamannādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2851: evaṃ jñātvā dīyamānena nityaṃ prīṇāti viṣṇurnānyathā vyarthameva // GarP_3,22.76 //
GP12garup3_u:2852: gṛhe nityaṃ vāsudevo haristu prīṇāti nityaṃ tatra tiṣṭhansuparṇa /
GP12garup3_u:2853: evaṃ jñātvā svagṛhaṃ sarvadaiva alaṅkuryāddhāturūpaiḥ sadaiva // GarP_3,22.77 //
GP12garup3_u:2855: mitre mukundaḥ śālake cānirūddho nārāyaṇo dvijavarye sadāsti // GarP_3,22.78 //
GP12garup3_u:2856: goṣṭhe ca nityaṃ viṣṇurūpī haristu aśve sadā tiṣṭhati vāmanākhyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2857: saṃkarṣaṇaḥ śūdravarṇe sadāsti vaiśye pradyumnastiṣṭhati sarvadaiva // GarP_3,22.79 //
GP12garup3_u:2858: janārdanaḥ kṣattrajātau sadāsti dāśeṣu nityaṃ mahidāso haristu /
GP12garup3_u:2859: mahyāṃ nityaṃ tiṣṭhati sarvadaiva hyupendrākhyo harirekaḥ suparṇa // GarP_3,22.80 //
GP12garup3_u:2860: gaje sadā tiṣṭhati cakrapāṇiḥ sadāntare tiṣṭhati viśvarūpaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2861: nityaṃ śuni tiṣṭhati bhūtabhāvanaḥ pipīlakāyāmapi sarvadaiva // GarP_3,22.81 //
GP12garup3_u:2863: harerna varṇosti na gotramasti na jātirīśe sarvarūpe vicitre // GarP_3,22.82 //
GP12garup3_u:2864: evaṃ jñātvā sarvadā lakṣmaṇā tu hariṃ sadā prīṇayāmāsa devī /
GP12garup3_u:2865: saparyayā vai kriyamāṇayā hariḥ patirmamasya diti cintayānā // GarP_3,22.83 //
GP12garup3_u:2866: tatyāja dehaṃ viṣṇupatitvakāmā madreṣu vai vīndra putrī prajātā /
GP12garup3_u:2867: svayaṃvare lakṣmaṇāyā ahaṃ ca bhittvā lakṣyaṃ bhūpatīndrāvayitvā // GarP_3,22.84 //
GP12garup3_u:2868: pāṇigrahaṃ lakṣmaṇāyāśca kṛtvā gatvā purīṃ ramayāmāsa devī /
GP12garup3_u:2869: tathaivāhaṃ jāṃbavatyā vivāhaṃ matpatnītve kāraṇaṃ tvāṃ bravīmi // GarP_3,22.85 //
GP12garup3_u:2870: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe lakṣmaṇāvivāhahetunirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvāviṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2874: somasya putrī pūrvasarge babhūva bhāryā madīyā jāmbavatī mama priyā /
GP12garup3_u:2875: tāsāṃ madhye hyadhikā vīndra kiñcidrudrādibhyaḥ pañcaguṇairvihīnā // GarP_3,23.1 //
GP12garup3_u:2877: yadāveśāddhrāsamupaiti kāle tadā tāsāṃ sāmyamāhurmahāntaḥ // GarP_3,23.2 //
GP12garup3_u:2880: tāsāṃ madhye jāmbavantī tu kṛṣṇa ārādhanaṃ kīdṛśaṃ sā cakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2881: tanme brūhi kṛpayā viśvamūrte ādhikye vai kāraṇaṃ tābhya eva // GarP_3,23.4 //
GP12garup3_u:2885: yā pūrvasarge somaputrī babhūva piturgṛhe vartamānāpi sādhvī /
GP12garup3_u:2886: janma svakīyaṃ sārthakaṃ vai cakāra pitrā sākaṃ viṣṇuśuśrūṣaṇe na ca // GarP_3,23.6 //
GP12garup3_u:2887: śuśrāva nityaṃ satpurāṇāni caivaṃ cakre sadā viṣṇupādapraṇāmam /
GP12garup3_u:2888: cakre sadā tārakasyāpi viṣṇoḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ smaraṇaṃ kurvatī sā // GarP_3,23.7 //
GP12garup3_u:2889: pitrā sākaṃ sā tu kanyā khagendra vairāgyayuktā śravaṇātsaṃbabhūva /
GP12garup3_u:2890: keśaṃ ca mitraṃ dviradādikaṃ ca anarghyaratnāni gṛhādikaṃ ca // GarP_3,23.8 //
GP12garup3_u:2891: sarvaṃ hyetannaśvaraṃ caiva mene mamādhīnaṃ hariṇā vai kṛtaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2892: yenaiva dattaṃ putramitrādikaṃ ca tenā hṛtaṃ vedanāṃ naiva cakre // GarP_3,23.9 //
GP12garup3_u:2893: adyaiva viṣṇuḥ paramo dayāluḥ dayāṃ mayi kṛtavāṃste na suṣṭhu /
GP12garup3_u:2894: pitrā sākaṃ kanyakā sā tu vīndra sadātmani hyamale vāsudeve // GarP_3,23.10 //
GP12garup3_u:2895: ekāntatvaṃ suṣṭhu bhaktyā gatā sā yadṛcchayā sopapannena devī /
GP12garup3_u:2896: akalpayantyātmano vīndra vṛttiṃ cakāra yatsāvadhirādhaṃ prathaiva // GarP_3,23.11 //
GP12garup3_u:2897: sā vai vittaṃ viṣṇupādāravinde duḥ khārṇavāttarāke saṃcakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2898: vāgīndridriyaṃ khaga samyak cakāra harerguṇānāṃ varṇane vā sadaiva // GarP_3,23.12 //
GP12garup3_u:2899: hastau ca viṣṇorgṛhasaṃmārjanādau cakāra devī gātramalāpahāram /
GP12garup3_u:2900: śrotraṃ ca cakre harisatkathodaye mokṣādimārge hyamṛtopame ca // GarP_3,23.13 //
GP12garup3_u:2902: sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ sparśane caiva saṃge nirmālyagandhānuvilepane tvak // GarP_3,23.14 //
GP12garup3_u:2903: ghrārṇedriyaṃ sā haripādasāre cakāra saṃsāravimuktide ca /
GP12garup3_u:2906: kāmaṃ hṛdāsye tu haridāsyakāmyā tathottamaślokajanāścaranti // GarP_3,23.16 //
GP12garup3_u:2907: niṣkāmarūpe ca matiṃ cakāra vāgindriyaṃ stavanaṃ svīcakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2908: evaṃ sadā kāryasamūhamātmanā samarpayitvā parameśapādayoḥ // GarP_3,23.17 //
GP12garup3_u:2909: tīrthāṭanārthaṃ tu jagāma pitrā sākaṃ hareḥ prīṇanādyarthameva /
GP12garup3_u:2912: yāvatkālaṃ tīrthayātrā mukunda tāvatkālaṃ tūrdhvaretā bhavāmi // GarP_3,23.19 //
GP12garup3_u:2913: yāvatkālaṃ tīrthayātrāṃ kariṣye tāvaddattādvaiṣṇavānāṃ ca saṃgam /
GP12garup3_u:2914: hareḥ kathāśravaṇaṃ syānmukunda nāvaiṣṇavānāṃ saṃgināmaṅgasaṃgam // GarP_3,23.20 //
GP12garup3_u:2915: suhṛjjanaiḥ putramitrādikaiśca dīrthāṭanaṃ naiva kuryāṃ mukunda /
GP12garup3_u:2916: kurvanti ye kāmyayā tīrthayātrāṃ teṣāṃ saṃgaṃ kuru dūre mukunda // GarP_3,23.21 //
GP12garup3_u:2917: śālagrāmaṃ ye vihāyaiva yātrāṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ kiṃ phalaṃ prāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2918: yadā tīrthānāṃ darśanaṃ syāttadaiva śālagrāmaṃ purataḥ sthāpayitvā // GarP_3,23.22 //
GP12garup3_u:2919: tīrthāṭanaṃ pādacairaiḥ kṛtaṃ cetpūrṇaṃ phalaṃ prāhurāryāḥ khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:2920: pādatrāṇaṃ pādarakṣāṃ ca kṛtvā tīrthāṭanaṃ pādahīnaṃ tadāhuḥ // GarP_3,23.23 //
GP12garup3_u:2921: yo vāhane turage copaviṣṭastīrthāṭanaṃ kurute cārdhahīnam /
GP12garup3_u:2922: vṛṣādīnāṃ vāhane pādamāhuḥ parānnānāṃ bhojane vyarthamāhuḥ // GarP_3,23.24 //
GP12garup3_u:2923: mahātmanāṃ vedavidāṃ yatīnāṃ parānnānāṃ bhojane naiva doṣaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2924: saṃkalpayitvā paramādareṇa jagāma sā tīrthayātrārthameva // GarP_3,23.25 //
GP12garup3_u:2925: ādau snātvā harinirmātyagandhaṃ visarjayitvā śravaṇaṃ vai cakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2926: pitrā sākaṃ bhojanaṃ cāpi kṛtvā agre dine krośamekaṃ jagāma // GarP_3,23.26 //
GP12garup3_u:2927: tatra dvijānpūjayitvānnapāna rātrau tattvaṃ śrāvayāmāsa devī /
GP12garup3_u:2928: evaṃ yātrāṃ ye prakurvanti nityaṃ teṣāṃ yātrāṃ saphalāṃ prāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,23.27 //
GP12garup3_u:2929: vinā dayāṃ tīrthayātrā khagendravyarthetyevaṃ vīndra cāhurmahāntaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2930: divā rātrau ye na śṛṇvanti divyāṃ hareḥ kathāṃ tīrthamārge khagendra // GarP_3,23.28 //
GP12garup3_u:2931: vyarthaṃvyarthaṃ tasya cāhurgataṃ vai aśvādīnāṃ vāhanānāṃ ca viddhi /
GP12garup3_u:2936: anusaṃdhānādrahitaṃ sarvameva kṛtaṃ vyarthameveti cāhuḥ // GarP_3,23.31 //
GP12garup3_u:2937: ato hareḥ pāpavināśinīṃ kathāṃ śrutvā viṣṇorbhaktimānsyātvagandra /
GP12garup3_u:2938: dṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā haripādāṅkitaṃ ca smṛtvāsmṛtvā bhaktimānsyātkhagendra // GarP_3,23.32 //
GP12garup3_u:2939: pitrā sākaṃ kanyakā sāpi vīndra śeṣācalasthaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca draṣṭum /
GP12garup3_u:2940: jagāma sā mārgamadhye hariṃ ca sā cintayāmāsa ramāpatiṃ ca // GarP_3,23.33 //
GP12garup3_u:2941: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya vakṣaḥ śrīvatsaratnairbhūṣitaṃ vistṛtaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2942: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya tundaṃ valitrayeṇāṅkitaṃ suṃdaraṃ ca // GarP_3,23.34 //
GP12garup3_u:2943: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya kaṇṭhaṃ maharlokasyāśrayaṃ kaṃbutulyam /
GP12garup3_u:2944: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya nābhiṃ sadāntarikṣasyāśrayaṃ vai supūrṇam // GarP_3,23.35 //
GP12garup3_u:2945: kadā drakṣye vadanaṃ vai murārerjanalokasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva // GarP_3,23.36 //
GP12garup3_u:2946: śiraḥ kadā śrīnivāsasya drakṣye satyasya lokasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2947: kaṭiṃ kadā śrīnivāsasya drakṣye bhūrlokasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva // GarP_3,23.37 //
GP12garup3_u:2948: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya coru talātalasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2949: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya jānu sukomalaṃ sutalasyāśrayaṃ ca // GarP_3,23.38 //
GP12garup3_u:2950: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya jaṅghe rasātalasyāśrayeḥ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2951: kadā drakṣye pādatalaṃ hareśca pātālalokasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva // GarP_3,23.39 //
GP12garup3_u:2952: itthaṃ mārge cintayantī ca devī śeṣācale śeṣadevaṃ dadarśa /
GP12garup3_u:2955: taddarśanādvāṣpakalākulekṣaṇā sadyaḥ samutthāya nanāma mūrdhnā // GarP_3,23.41 //
GP12garup3_u:2956: mukhaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā namanaṃ ca kāryaṃ pṛṣṭhādibhāge namanaṃ na kāryam /
GP12garup3_u:2957: sāpi dviṣaṭkaṃ namanaṃ ca cakre śālagrāmaṃ sthāpayitvā puro 'sya // GarP_3,23.42 //
GP12garup3_u:2958: itthaṃ kāryaṃ vaiṣṇavaiḥ parvatasya tvaṃ vaiṣṇavairviparītaṃ ca kāryam /
GP12garup3_u:2959: madhvāntaḥsthaḥ parvatāgresti nityaṃ ramābrahmādyaiḥ pūjitaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ // GarP_3,23.43 //
GP12garup3_u:2961: ityevamuktvā kapilākhyatīrthe sthānaṃ cakre sā svapitrā sahaiva // GarP_3,23.44 //
GP12garup3_u:2962: atraivāste śrīnivāso haristu dravyeṇa rūpeṇa na cānyatheti /
GP12garup3_u:2963: ādausnātvā muṇḍanaṃ tatra kṛtvā tīrthaśrāddhaṃ kārayitvā sutīrthe // GarP_3,23.45 //
GP12garup3_u:2965: śālagrāmaṃ sthāpayitvā sa cāgre punaḥ praṇāmaṃ sāpi cakre subhaktyā // GarP_3,23.46 //
GP12garup3_u:2966: sopānānāṃ śataparyantamevamāruhya sā hyupaviṣṭā tu tatra /
GP12garup3_u:2967: śuśrāva sā bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ śuśrāva vaiveṅkaṭādreḥ praśaṃsām // GarP_3,23.47 //
GP12garup3_u:2968: jaigīṣavyādgurupādātsubhaktyā suśrāva tattvaṃ veṅkaṭādreśca sarvam // GarP_3,23.48 //
GP12garup3_u:2969: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe veṅkaṭeśagiriyātrākramanirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayoviṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2973: kanye śṛṇu tvaṃ veṅkaṭākhyācalasya smerānanāṃ puṇyamāṃrohaṇe 'sya /
GP12garup3_u:2974: śrīgītāyāḥ paṭhanaṃ caiva kurvannārohaṇaṃ kurute sarvalokaḥ // GarP_3,24.1 //
GP12garup3_u:2975: padepade śrīnivāsaśca devastvalaṃ hyalaṃ prīyate bhaktavargaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2976: taṃ prīṇayanmokṣamāyānti sarve harau tuṣṭe kimalabhyaṃ ca kanye // GarP_3,24.2 //
GP12garup3_u:2977: sopānadeśe yaḥ purāṇaṃ śṛṇoti tadā kṛtā sarvatīrthādiyātrā /
GP12garup3_u:2978: tadā divā prastuvantīha mārge sadā hariṃ śrīnivāsaṃ guruṃ ca // GarP_3,24.3 //
GP12garup3_u:2979: sopānānāṃ mahimānaṃ ca śrutvā śālagrāmaṃ sthāpayitvā ca tatra /
GP12garup3_u:2980: namaskṛtvā punarevāpi sā tu sopānāni tvārurohātha sādhvī // GarP_3,24.4 //
GP12garup3_u:2981: sopānānāṃ vīndra cārohaṇena tvavaiṣṇavānāṃ haritoṣo na caiva /
GP12garup3_u:2982: tenaiva teṣāṃ sādhanaṃ bhūya eva tamasyandhe pātayituṃ khagendra // GarP_3,24.5 //
GP12garup3_u:2983: sthalesthale evamevāpi kāryaṃ jaigīṣavyaṃ punarevāha devī /
GP12garup3_u:2985: jaigīṣavyaḥ śrīnivāso haristu brahmādīnāṃ dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ // GarP_3,24.6 //
GP12garup3_u:2986: jaigīṣavya kṛpayā tvaṃ vadasva jaigīṣavyo hyevamukto hariṃ tu /
GP12garup3_u:2987: uvāca kanyāṃ somaputrīṃ satīṃ ca brahmādīnāṃ dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ // GarP_3,24.7 //
GP12garup3_u:2991: ṛṣyādīnāṃ dṛśyate candravacca sanmānuṣāṇāmaparokṣo haristu // GarP_3,24.9 //
GP12garup3_u:2993: sa sūryavaddṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ saṃsāriṇāṃ veṅkaṭeśaḥ khagendra // GarP_3,24.10 //
GP12garup3_u:2994: saṃdohavaddṛśyate vai prakāśo mithyāvatāṃ dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2995: pāṣāṇavannailyarūpaprakāśaḥ śilāmātre dṛṣyate vai kalau ca // GarP_3,24.11 //
GP12garup3_u:2996: nṛṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śrīnivāso haristu kalau svarūpaṃ śrīnivāsasya devī /
GP12garup3_u:2997: na mānuṣāḥ pravijānanti sarve yataḥ kalau tāmasā rājasāstu // GarP_3,24.12 //
GP12garup3_u:2998: tatsaṃginaḥ sāttvikāḥ kecideva hyato bhaktā durlabhā vai kalau ca /
GP12garup3_u:2999: ye dṛśyante bhaktavatte na bhaktāḥ śiśrodarayorbharaṇe caiva saktāḥ // GarP_3,24.13 //
GP12garup3_u:3000: kurvanti yātrāṃ ca tadarthameva bhaktijñānaṃ durlabhaṃ vai kalau ca /
GP12garup3_u:3001: bhaktā ye vai na viraktāḥ sadaiva teṣāṃ harerdarśanaṃ durlabhaṃ ca // GarP_3,24.14 //
GP12garup3_u:3002: bhaktasvarūpaṃ tava vakṣye khagendra yo jñānapūrṇaḥ parame snigdha eva /
GP12garup3_u:3003: na ca dveṣairbandhuro bhaktiyuktastava dveṣāñchṛṇu vakṣye ca samyak // GarP_3,24.15 //
GP12garup3_u:3005: jñānānandaiḥ paripūrṇe harau ca guṇairapūrṇo harirityeva cintā // GarP_3,24.16 //
GP12garup3_u:3006: śrībrahmarudrādidivaukasāṃ sadā tathā dvijānāṃ saṃmānāyāśca cintā /
GP12garup3_u:3007: viṣṇoḥ sakāśādbrahmarudrādikānāṃ sadādhikyālocanaṃ dveṣa eva // GarP_3,24.17 //
GP12garup3_u:3009: avatārāṇā chedabhedādikaṃ ca tathocyate maraṇasyāpi cintā // GarP_3,24.18 //
GP12garup3_u:3010: tadbhaktānāṃ dveṣaṇaṃ cāhurāryāstadvākyānāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dveṣa eva /
GP12garup3_u:3011: naca dveṣaiḥ saṃyutā ye ca loke kanye dṛśyante na tu bhaktāḥ kadācit // GarP_3,24.19 //
GP12garup3_u:3013: jaigīṣavya brūhi me ke ca bhaktā bhaktiṃ kathaṃ darśayāmāsurete /
GP12garup3_u:3014: teṣāṃ hariḥ śrīnivāso mahātmā trātā sadā bhaktavarge dayāluḥ // GarP_3,24.20 //
GP12garup3_u:3015: jaigīṣavyastvevamukto mahātmā uvāca kanyāṃ saṃsmaran bhaktavaryaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3017: prahādādyā śrīnivāsasya bhaktāḥ kṛtvā nṛsiṃhe cottamāṃ bhaktimeva // GarP_3,24.21 //
GP12garup3_u:3018: avāpa sāmrājyamanuttamaṃ ca jñānaṃ nṛsiṃhātsamavāpa paścāt /
GP12garup3_u:3019: parāśaraḥ śrīnibāsasya bhakto bhaktiṃ kṛtvā vyāsarūpaṃ hariṃ ca // GarP_3,24.22 //
GP12garup3_u:3020: stutvā tena jñānatattvaṃ hyavāpya jagāma mokṣaṃ bhaktisaṃvardhitātmā /
GP12garup3_u:3021: yo nāradaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhakto bhaktiṃ kṛtvā garbhavāse harau ca // GarP_3,24.23 //
GP12garup3_u:3022: tayā bhaktyā brahmaputratvamāpa jñānaprāptyā tena muktiṃ jagāma /
GP12garup3_u:3023: yo hyaṃbarīṣaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhaktaḥ kṛtvā bhaktiṃ paradeva harau ca // GarP_3,24.24 //
GP12garup3_u:3024: japtvā jñānaṃ prāpya durvāsakaścāpyavāpa mokṣaṃ tena saṃvardhitātmā /
GP12garup3_u:3025: mucukundo vai śrīnivāsasya bhakto vairāgyato bhaktidārḍhyaṃ ca kṛtvā // GarP_3,24.25 //
GP12garup3_u:3026: tattvajñānaṃ prāpya viṣṇormahātmā hyavāpa mokṣaṃ tena saṃvardhitātmā /
GP12garup3_u:3027: sa puṇḍarīkaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhaktaḥ pitrādiṣṭo viṣṇubhaktiṃ ca kṛtvā // GarP_3,24.26 //
GP12garup3_u:3029: brahmā ca vāyuśca sarasvatī ca jñātavyāḥ sarve ṛjuyoginaśca // GarP_3,24.27 //
GP12garup3_u:3030: acchinnabhaktāśca sadā murārerna kāmyaraktāḥ śuddharūpā hi te ca /
GP12garup3_u:3033: parjanyamitrādaya eva sarve sadā hyete śrīnivāsasya bhaktāḥ // GarP_3,24.29 //
GP12garup3_u:3034: viśvāmitro bhṛguraurvaśca kutso marīciratriḥ pulahaḥ kratuśca /
GP12garup3_u:3035: śaktirvasiṣṭho sautamīyo pulastyo bhāradvājaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhaktāḥ // GarP_3,24.30 //
GP12garup3_u:3036: māndhātā nahuṣoṃbarīṣasagarau rājā pṛthurhaihayo ikṣvākurbharato yayātisutalau dharmo vikukṣistathā /
GP12garup3_u:3037: uttānaśca bibhīṣaṇo daśaratho hyete mahājñāninaḥ śrīmadveṅkaṭanāyakasya ca gurorbhaktāḥ sadā saṃsmṛtāḥ // GarP_3,24.31 //
GP12garup3_u:3039: godāvarī narmadā ca kṛṣṇā bhīmarathī tathā // GarP_3,24.32 //
GP12garup3_u:3041: ityetāśca harerbhaktāḥ saṃti cātraiva bhāmini // GarP_3,24.33 //
GP12garup3_u:3042: abhiprāyaṃ tatra vakṣye śṛṇu kanye mayā sati /
GP12garup3_u:3043: yatra pravartate mārge kathā viṣṇormahātmanaḥ // GarP_3,24.34 //
GP12garup3_u:3045: tatraiva bhaktāḥ sarvepi saṃti viṣṇostathaiva ca // GarP_3,24.35 //
GP12garup3_u:3046: ye devayātrāṃ paramātmacintayā kurvanti te haribhaktāśca nānye /
GP12garup3_u:3047: yato harau parame vaiṣṇavānāṃ sarvaṃ niṣṭhāmeti kṛtyaṃ khagendra // GarP_3,24.36 //
GP12garup3_u:3049: yo na dadyādabhaktaḥ sa tataḥ ko nu paraḥ paśuḥ // GarP_3,24.37 //
GP12garup3_u:3050: bhaktā hareḥ śrīnivāsācale ca gaṅgādirūpeṇa ca tatratatra /
GP12garup3_u:3051: tiṣṭhanti sevārthamurukramasya teṣāṃ pūjā naiva kāryā ca devi // GarP_3,24.38 //
GP12garup3_u:3052: abhiprāyaṃ tatra vakṣye śṛṇu tvaṃ tatra sthale vastragandhādidhūpaiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3053: purāṇoktā api bhedena pūjyā dṛṣṭvā ca tānvandayetprājña eva // GarP_3,24.39 //
GP12garup3_u:3054: sadbrāhmaṇānvandayetpādamūle hastau ca dvau saṃpuṭīkṛtya devi /
GP12garup3_u:3055: sāṣṭāṅgarupaṃ vandanaṃ caiva viṣṇoḥ kuryāttathā gurave viṣṇubuddhyā // GarP_3,24.40 //
GP12garup3_u:3056: gaṅgādīnāṃ vandanaṃ kāryameva sāṣṭāṅgaṃ vai tulasīnāṃ tathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:3057: aśvatthānāṃ namanaṃ kāryameva gavādīnāṃ namanaṃ mānasena // GarP_3,24.41 //
GP12garup3_u:3058: pūjā sadā devadevasya viṣṇoḥ kāryā bhaktyā vaiṣṇavaireva nānyaiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3059: ye nāmakā jñānavantaḥ subhaktāḥ sadaiva kāryā viṣṇupūjā ca kanye // GarP_3,24.42 //
GP12garup3_u:3060: ye nāmakā jñānavantaḥ subhaktāḥ sadaivaṃ kāryā viṣṇupūjā ca kanye /
GP12garup3_u:3061: yenāmakā viṣṇubhaktāḥ sadaiva pūjā viṣṇornaiva kāryātra devi // GarP_3,24.43 //
GP12garup3_u:3062: mohādyo vai pūjayeddevadevaṃ mahādharmādyāti cāndhaṃ tamo vai /
GP12garup3_u:3063: brahmādināmāni harerhi devīṃ viṣṇoḥ svanāmāni dadau divaukasām // GarP_3,24.44 //
GP12garup3_u:3064: nādāddhīraḥ keśavādīni kanye svakaṃ puraṃ pravihāyaiva rājā /
GP12garup3_u:3065: evaṃ mayoktaṃ kanyake sarvametadetatparaṃ samyagārohaṇīyam // GarP_3,24.45 //
GP12garup3_u:3066: govinda nārāyaṇa mādhaveti yūyaṃ mayā sarvamārādhitavyam /
GP12garup3_u:3067: sarve militvā punarevaṃ khagendra samāruhanvaiṅkaṭādriṃ gṛṇantaḥ // GarP_3,24.46 //
GP12garup3_u:3069: draṣṭuṃ sarve śrīnivāsaṃ tathaiva kurvantaste talaśabdaṃ nadantaḥ // GarP_3,24.47 //
GP12garup3_u:3070: iti kṛṣṇavacaḥ śrutvā tārkṣyaḥ kṛṣṇamuvācaha kathamāsvādanaṃ cakruretadvistīryame vada /
GP12garup3_u:3072: bho śrīnivāsa tava nāmaiva caitannāma svāmī nanu nāmaiva svāmī /
GP12garup3_u:3073: yāṃ brahmādyā āśrayantītti yasmāttasmādramā śrīriti nāma cāpa // GarP_3,24.48 //
GP12garup3_u:3075: bho śrīnivāseti tu nartayanto romāñcamātrāstalaśabdakāriṇaḥ // GarP_3,24.49 //
GP12garup3_u:3076: adyaiva paśyāma harestavāsyaṃ kadā vayaṃ kṛta kṛtyā bhavāmaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3077: bhoḥ keśavādyaiva padāravindaṃ saṃdarśayitvā sudayāṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,24.50 //
GP12garup3_u:3079: īśaṃ cārhaṃ rudramityeva cāhustatprerakaṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārakārye // GarP_3,24.51 //
GP12garup3_u:3080: ato hariḥ keśavanāmadheyo bhoḥ keśaveti ca nartayantaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3081: ānandavāpīṃ saṃstravantobhi jagmurnārāyaṇeti pravadanto hi jagmuḥ // GarP_3,24.52 //
GP12garup3_u:3083: nārāyaṇeti pravadantīha loke nārānubandhātsarvamuktāḥ khagendra // GarP_3,24.53 //
GP12garup3_u:3084: nārāḥ proktā āśrayatvācca teṣāmatopi nārāyaṇa eva vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:3085: muktāśca ye tu prapadaṃnu jagmuraṇḍodakaṃ yasya kaṭākṣamātrāt // GarP_3,24.54 //
GP12garup3_u:3086: yadutpannaṃ tena nārāḥ khagendra teṣāṃ sadāpyāśrayatvācca vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:3088: evaṃ nanṛtuḥ pariśaṃsayanto govinda nānyo hi na caiva darśanam /
GP12garup3_u:3089: gośabdavācyāstu samastavāco gobhiśca sarvaiḥ pratipādyate yataḥ // GarP_3,24.56 //
GP12garup3_u:3090: ato hi govinda iti smṛtaḥ sadā bho vedavedyeti tathā na nanṛtuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3091: ānandabāṣpaiśca samanvitā hi hare murāre tava darśanaṃ hi // GarP_3,24.57 //
GP12garup3_u:3092: dehi prabho vai tavadāsadāsāścaturdaśe bhuvane sarvadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:3093: yatastvamevaṃ vasatīti vāsuścātraiva nityaṃ krīḍate sarvadaiva // GarP_3,24.58 //
GP12garup3_u:3095: bho vāsudeveti nanṛtuḥ sarvadaiva bho mādhaveti nanṛtuścaiva sarve // GarP_3,24.59 //
GP12garup3_u:3096: lakṣmīpate ceti vadanti sarve dhanīti śabdaḥ svābhivācī yato hi /
GP12garup3_u:3097: atopyāryā mādhaveti bruvanti lakṣmīpate pāhi tathaiva bhaktān // GarP_3,24.60 //
GP12garup3_u:3098: te vai bruvanto nanṛtuśca jagmurviṣṇo sadāsmānparipāhi nityam /
GP12garup3_u:3100: jagmuśca sarve dadṛśuśca tīrthaṃ bhaktyopetāḥ śrīnivāsaṃ smarantaḥ // GarP_3,24.61 //
GP12garup3_u:3102: kiṃ nāmakaṃ tīrthamidaṃ munīndra kiṃ kāryamatra pravadāsmānkṛtīśa /
GP12garup3_u:3103: kasmai prasanno bhagavāñchrīnivāsastvasminsutīrthaṃ vada vistareṇa // GarP_3,24.62 //
GP12garup3_u:3106: niṣkāmabuddhyā tu yadā jagāma śeṣācalasthaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca draṣṭum // GarP_3,24.63 //
GP12garup3_u:3108: nṛsiṃharūpaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ bhajasva sudurlabhaṃ mānuṣaṃ janma kanye // GarP_3,24.64 //
GP12garup3_u:3109: tatrāpi viṣṇornṛhare sutattvaṃ sudurlabhaṃ suṣṭhu yātrā tathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:3110: yasyāṃ yātrāyāṃ yatra kutrāpi deśe hareḥ kathā vartate daityavaryāḥ // GarP_3,24.65 //
GP12garup3_u:3111: tatra sthale harirāste sadaiva yato vyāptaḥ sarvato vai nṛsiṃhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3113: vyāpto hariścetkathamatra vai sakhe na dṛśyate jalarūpī nṛsiṃhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3114: sa evamukto dānavānāṃ sutaiśca tuṣṭāva viṣṇuṃ paramādareṇa // GarP_3,24.67 //
GP12garup3_u:3115: tava svarūpaṃ mama darśayasva svayogyarūpaṃ dānavānāṃ sutānām /
GP12garup3_u:3116: iti stutaḥ śrīnivāso haristu tasminnantarjalarūpaṃ samāyāt // GarP_3,24.68 //
GP12garup3_u:3117: asminsnānaṃ ye prakurvanti tīrthe teṣāṃ jñānaṃ paramaṃ dṛḍhaṃ syāt /
GP12garup3_u:3118: atra snāne mānuṣāṇāṃ ca tāta buddhirna hi syātkalikāle viśeṣāt // GarP_3,24.69 //
GP12garup3_u:3119: dattvāṃ varaṃ daityavarāya viṣṇurantardadhe jalapūrṇe sukuṇḍe /
GP12garup3_u:3120: adyāpyāste jalamadhye nṛsiṃhaḥ prahlādopi daityakumārakaiḥ saha // GarP_3,24.70 //
GP12garup3_u:3121: tasmin sutīrthe paritastatratatra jayeti śabdaḥ śrūyate cāparāhne /
GP12garup3_u:3122: idaṃ tīrthaṃ nārasiṃhābhidhaṃ ca kanyesnānaṃ hyatra kāryaṃ manuṣyaiḥ // GarP_3,24.71 //
GP12garup3_u:3123: snānaṃ kṛtvā tatra tīrthe ca samyagdīpaṃ dattvā dvijavaryāya mukhyam /
GP12garup3_u:3124: draṣṭuṃ punaḥ śrīnivāsaṃ prajagmurgovindagovinda iti bruvantaḥ // GarP_3,24.72 //
GP12garup3_u:3126: jaigīṣavyaḥ śrīnivāsasya viṣṇoḥ kathaṃ kāryaṃ darśanaṃ tadvadasva // GarP_3,24.73 //
GP12garup3_u:3127: jaigīṣavyaḥ prāha saṃhṛṣṭacitto bravīmi tantraṃ śṛṇu kanyake tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3128: śrutvā mattaḥ kuru sarvaṃ mayoktamādyaṃ dvāraṃ śrīnivāsasya dṛṣṭvā // GarP_3,24.74 //
GP12garup3_u:3130: tāni sarvāṇi me deva kṣamasva puruṣottama // GarP_3,24.75 //
GP12garup3_u:3133: ādyadvāraṃ śrīnivāsasya devi samyak smaredvijayaṃ vai jayaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3134: dakṣādhvare śrīnivāsasya devi caṇḍaṃ pracaṇḍaṃ saṃsmaretsamyageva // GarP_3,24.77 //
GP12garup3_u:3135: pāścātyabhāge śrīnivāsasya devi nandaṃ sunandaṃ saṃsmaredeva bhaktyā /
GP12garup3_u:3136: savyadvāre śrīnivāsasya kanye smaretkumudākṣaṃ kumudantameva // GarP_3,24.78 //
GP12garup3_u:3137: yaścaiva dehaṃ praviśedbhaktipūrvaṃ kadā drakṣye sādareṇaiva devi /
GP12garup3_u:3138: pradakṣiṇadvādaśakaṃ ca kṛtvā pade pade saṃsmarecchrīnivāsam // GarP_3,24.79 //
GP12garup3_u:3139: śrīsvāmitīrthe samyagācamya natvā snātvā natvā bhūvarāhaṃ ca devi /
GP12garup3_u:3142: punarviśedvārataḥ saṃsthitaḥ sa pīṭhasthadevānmānasā cintayīta // GarP_3,24.81 //
GP12garup3_u:3143: madhye pīṭhaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca devī nārāyaṇaṃ praṇametpūrṇameva /
GP12garup3_u:3144: devasya savye pīṭhabhāgādvahiśca namaskāryaṃ gurudevāya caiva // GarP_3,24.82 //
GP12garup3_u:3146: nairṛtyabhāge vyāsadevāya devi namaskāryo vaiṣṇavaḥ sarvadāpi // GarP_3,24.83 //
GP12garup3_u:3148: pīṭhasyordhvaṃ hyagnikoṇeṣu devī dharmādhibhūtāya namo yamāya // GarP_3,24.84 //
GP12garup3_u:3150: pīṭhasyordhvaṃ vāyukoṇe ca subhrūrvairāgyānāmadhipaṃ caiva rudram // GarP_3,24.85 //
GP12garup3_u:3151: pīṭhasyordhvaṃ tvīśakoṇe ca devi aiśvaryāṇāmadhipaṃ cendradevam /
GP12garup3_u:3152: pīṭhasya pūrve praṇamennairṛtiṃ ca aryāmṇānāmadhipaṃ cātra devi // GarP_3,24.86 //
GP12garup3_u:3153: devasya pīṭhasya ca dakṣiṇe ca durgāṃ namedugrarūpābhidhāṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3154: pīṭhasya kanye praṇametpaścime vai ārogyāṇā madhipaṃ kāmadevam // GarP_3,24.87 //
GP12garup3_u:3156: pīṭhasya madhye praṇamedvai varāhaṃ sadā kanye paramaṃ pūruṣākhyam // GarP_3,24.88 //
GP12garup3_u:3160: tasyopariṣṭādvaruṇaṃ saṃsmarecca kṣīrodadheradhipaṃ caiva devam // GarP_3,24.90 //
GP12garup3_u:3162: tasyopariṣṭātpraṇameccaiva lakṣmīṃ mahādivyāṃ maṇḍapasaṃjñakāṃ ca // GarP_3,24.91 //
GP12garup3_u:3163: pīṭhasya madhye yamasaṃjñāṃ ca lakṣmīṃ samarcayedyamamadhye ca devīm /
GP12garup3_u:3164: yamasya devasya ca dakṣiṇe ca sūryaṃ nameddīparūpaṃ ca bhadre // GarP_3,24.92 //
GP12garup3_u:3165: yamasya devasya ca vāmabhāge śriyaṃ nameddīparūpāṃ ca devīm /
GP12garup3_u:3166: yamasya devasya tu cāgrabhāge hutāśanaṃ dīparūpaṃ namecca // GarP_3,24.93 //
GP12garup3_u:3167: devasyāgre bhūmināmnīṃ namecca tattvābhimānāṃ saṃsmareccaiva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:3168: paryaṅkarūpaṃ śrīnivāsasya viṣṇostamobhimānāṃ sannameccaiva durgām // GarP_3,24.94 //
GP12garup3_u:3171: padmasya pūrvasthadale ca devi strīrūpākhyaṃ vimalākhyāmimāṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3173: utkarṣanāmnīṃ paramāṃ ca devīṃ namedramāṃ brahmavāyū ca śeṣam /
GP12garup3_u:3175: strīrūpebhyo namanaṃ kāryameva kanye mayā paścimasthe dale ca /
GP12garup3_u:3177: strīrūpebhyo namanaṃ kāryameva īśāna koṇasthadaleṣu caiva /
GP12garup3_u:3179: strīrūpebhyo namanaṃ kāryameva tathaiva padmasya ca madhyabhāge /
GP12garup3_u:3181: strīrūpāṇāṃ namanaṃ kāryameva suyogapīṭhasya svarūpa bhūtam /
GP12garup3_u:3182: sadā namecchrīmadanantasaṃjñamevaṃ na mecchrīnivāsaṃ ca devam // GarP_3,24.101 //
GP12garup3_u:3183: śrīnivāsasya vāme tu lakṣmīṃ ca praṇamedvudhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3184: śrīnivāsasya savye tu dharāyai praṇamecchubhe // GarP_3,24.102 //
GP12garup3_u:3186: maholkaṃ dakṣiṇe caiva vīrolkaṃ paścime namet // GarP_3,24.103 //
GP12garup3_u:3187: uttare ca namaḥ kuryādyulkāya ca mahātmane /
GP12garup3_u:3188: caturṣvapi ca koṇeṣu sahasrolkaṃ nametsudhīḥ // GarP_3,24.104 //
GP12garup3_u:3190: saṃkarṣaṇāya devāya pradyumnāya ca paścime // GarP_3,24.105 //
GP12garup3_u:3192: āgneye ca namaskuryātkanye māyāṃ sadā śubhe // GarP_3,24.106 //
GP12garup3_u:3195: keśavāya namaḥ pūrve tathā nārāyaṇāya ca /
GP12garup3_u:3197: āgneye kanyake nityaṃ bhaktyā tu prayataḥ śubhe /
GP12garup3_u:3200: paścime trivikramāya vāmanāya tathaiva ca // GarP_3,24.110 //
GP12garup3_u:3202: uttare tu mahākanye hṛṣīkeśāya vai namaḥ // GarP_3,24.111 //
GP12garup3_u:3209: paścime mādhavāyātha tathā kṛṣṇāya vai namaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3210: buddhāya ca namaskuryādvāyavye kanyake śubhe // GarP_3,24.115 //
GP12garup3_u:3213: āgneye vāruṇīṃ caiva gāyatrīṃ caiva nairṛte /
GP12garup3_u:3214: vāyavye bhāratīṃ caiva īśānye girijāṃ namet // GarP_3,24.117 //
GP12garup3_u:3215: girijāṃ vāmabhāge tu sauparṇai caiva saṃnamet /
GP12garup3_u:3219: dakṣiṇe tu yamāyaiva nairṛtyāṃ nirṛtiṃ yajet /
GP12garup3_u:3220: paścime varuṇāyaiva vāyavye vāyave namaḥ // GarP_3,24.120 //
GP12garup3_u:3221: uttare ca kuberāya īśānye ca śivāya ca /
GP12garup3_u:3224: evaṃ kṛtvā namaskāraṃ praṇamecca punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_3,24.122 //
GP12garup3_u:3226: itaḥ parantu gantavyaṃ darśanārthaṃ ramāpate // GarP_3,24.123 //
GP12garup3_u:3227: evamuktvā tu sā devī taiḥ sārdhaṃ tu yayau mudā /
GP12garup3_u:3230: samāgamo durghaṭa eva vīndra satāṃ ca sattattvavibodhakānām /
GP12garup3_u:3232: payo vikāraṃ ca nijaṃ jahāti śeṣasya śeṣaṃ nalinasya ṣaṅkajam /
GP12garup3_u:3233: bhāvaṃ calaṃ paṅkajanābhayogātsatsaṃgayogādaśubhāni na syuḥ // GarP_3,24.126 //
GP12garup3_u:3234: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe śrīveṅkaṭeśagiryārohaṇakramatadbhaktatatparvatanāmādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturviśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:3237: sā dvāradeśe śrīnivāsasya devī svāmipuṣkariṇīṃ dadṛśe kaiśca sārdham /
GP12garup3_u:3238: svāminhare śrīnivāseti sā taṃ brahmādīnāṃ tārakaṃ sampradadhyau // GarP_3,25.1 //
GP12garup3_u:3239: devaiḥ sārdhaṃ pālanārthaṃ ca viṣṇurastyeva nityaṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ jaleṣu /
GP12garup3_u:3240: ataḥ svāmipuṣkariṇīti cāhustatra snānaṃ kanyakānyāśca cakruḥ // GarP_3,25.2 //
GP12garup3_u:3241: śucirbhūtvā śrīnivāsaṃ ca devāstuptuṃ viviśuḥ śuddhabhaktyā khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:3242: yathopadiṣṭaṃ guruṇā tathaiva cakre kanyāśca sarvaṃ khagendra // GarP_3,25.3 //
GP12garup3_u:3243: tadā hariṃ darśayāmāsa tasyai svakaṃ rūpaṃ supratīke supūrṇam /
GP12garup3_u:3244: sā kanyakā śrīnivāsasya rūpaṃ dadarśa bhaktyā svamanobhirāmam // GarP_3,25.4 //
GP12garup3_u:3245: suvarṇacitraṃ vasanaṃ vasānaṃ soṣṇīṣakaṃ kañcukaṃ saṃdadhānam // GarP_3,25.5 //
GP12garup3_u:3250: dṛṣṭvā ca kanyā mumude romāñcitasugātrakā // GarP_3,25.8 //
GP12garup3_u:3252: nanarta devī puratastasya viṣṇoḥ sā dhvastadoṣā paramādareṇa /
GP12garup3_u:3253: ānanda māṃ pāhi sukhaṃ ca dattvā mukundā māṃ pāhi vimuktidānāt // GarP_3,25.9 //
GP12garup3_u:3254: māṃ pāhi nityaṃ hyaravindanetra prasannadṛṣṭyā karuṇāsudhārdra /
GP12garup3_u:3255: govinda govinda suduḥ khitāṃ māṃ jñānādidānena hi pāhi nityam // GarP_3,25.10 //
GP12garup3_u:3257: hare hare māṃ satataṃ pāhi daityānsamāhṛtya prabalānvighnarūpān // GarP_3,25.11 //
GP12garup3_u:3258: rameśa māṃ pāhi caturmukheśa viśveśa māṃ pāhi sarasvatīśa /
GP12garup3_u:3259: rameśa māṃ pāhi nidānamūrte vṛndāravṛndairvanditapādapadma // GarP_3,25.12 //
GP12garup3_u:3260: evaṃ tu natvā paramādareṇa tuṣṭāva viṣṇuṃ paramaṃ purāṇam /
GP12garup3_u:3261: lakṣmyā sadā ye 'viditā guṇāśca asaṃkhyātāḥ saṃti viṣṇau ca vīśa // GarP_3,25.13 //
GP12garup3_u:3262: teṣāṃ sakāśādatibāhulyasaṃkhyā guṇā harau te 'viditā vai ramāyāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3263: ato hare stavane kvāsti śaktistathāpi yatnaṃ stavane te kariṣye // GarP_3,25.14 //
GP12garup3_u:3265: rudraprasādātstavanaṃ te kariṣye tathāpi viṣṇo mayi śāntiṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,25.15 //
GP12garup3_u:3266: yadi prasannosi mayi tvamīśa tvatpādamūle dehi bhaktiṃ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:3267: tvaddarśanāddeva śubhāśubhaṃ ca naṣṭaṃ madīyaṃ hyaśubhaṃ ca nityam // GarP_3,25.16 //
GP12garup3_u:3268: tvanmāyayā naṣṭamimaṃ ca lokaṃ madena mattaṃ badhiraṃ cāndhabhūtam /
GP12garup3_u:3269: aiśvaryayogena ca yo hi mūko jātaḥ sadā dīnāgurvādikeṣu // GarP_3,25.17 //
GP12garup3_u:3271: tvaṃ deva me dehi satāṃ ca saṃgaṃ tava svarūpapratipādakānām // GarP_3,25.18 //
GP12garup3_u:3272: putrādīnāmaihikaṃ vāsudeva dagdhvā ca me dehi pādāravinde /
GP12garup3_u:3273: sadvaṣṇave kriyamāṇaṃ ca kopaṃ dagdhvā ca me dehi pādaravinde // GarP_3,25.19 //
GP12garup3_u:3274: dravyādike kriyamāṇaṃ ca lobhaṃ dagdhvā vai me dehi pādābjamūle /
GP12garup3_u:3275: putrādike kriyamāṇaṃ ca mohaṃ dagdhvā ca me dehi pādābjamūle // GarP_3,25.20 //
GP12garup3_u:3276: vidyāṃ putraṃ dravyajātaṃ madaṃ ca dagdhvā ca me dehi pādābjamūle /
GP12garup3_u:3277: sadvaiṣṇavāsahamānasvarūpaṃ dagdhvā mātsaryaṃ pāhi māṃ veṅkaṭeśa // GarP_3,25.21 //
GP12garup3_u:3278: mantraṃ ca me dehi nidānamūrte yenaiva me syāttava saṃgaśca bhūyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3279: nānyaṃ vṛṇe tava pādābjasaṃgāttadeva me dehi mama prasannaḥ // GarP_3,25.22 //
GP12garup3_u:3280: itīritaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ prasanna uvāca devo hyamṛtastravaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3281: atraiva kanye prajapasva mantraṃ sugopyarūpaṃ paramādareṇa // GarP_3,25.23 //
GP12garup3_u:3282: vakṣyāmi mantraṃ paramādareṇa śṛṇvadya bhaktyā paramādareṇa /
GP12garup3_u:3283: antaḥ sthamantyaṃ hyādyasaṃyuktameva sabindu tadvatsparśakādyena yuktam // GarP_3,25.24 //
GP12garup3_u:3284: ekārayuktaṃ prathamāntaḥ sthayuktaṃ samatrikoṇe coṣmaṇā saṃyutaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3285: takārasaktaṃ svarśamantaḥ sthayuktamādyanta oṃkārasamanvitaṃ ca // GarP_3,25.25 //
GP12garup3_u:3286: anena mantreṇa tavepsitaṃ ca bhaveddhi kanye nāntra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:3287: evaṃ sa uktvā śrīnivāso haristu pratīkavaddarśayāmāsa rūpam // GarP_3,25.26 //
GP12garup3_u:3288: natvā tu sā śrīnivāsaṃ ca devī uvāsa ha svāmisaraḥ samīpe /
GP12garup3_u:3289: tasmindine brāhmaṇādīṃśca sarvānsaṃtarpayāmāsa ca ṣaḍrasānnaiḥ // GarP_3,25.27 //
GP12garup3_u:3291: sākaṃ bhaktyā saṃpraṇamyātha devī pradakṣiṇaṃ śrīnivāsasya suṣṭhu // GarP_3,25.28 //
GP12garup3_u:3292: nanarta devī supratīkasya cāgre lajjāṃ tyaktvā jaya deveti coktvā /
GP12garup3_u:3293: ānṛttakāle ca hareśca vaktraṃ dṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭyā tu paraṃ nanarta // GarP_3,25.29 //
GP12garup3_u:3294: mamādya gātraṃ pāvitaṃ śrīnivāsa mamādya netraṃ saphalaṃ saṃbabhūva /
GP12garup3_u:3295: mamādya pādau sārthakau caiva jātau pradakṣiṇaṃ śrīnivāseśa kṛtvā // GarP_3,25.30 //
GP12garup3_u:3296: hastau ca me sārthakāvadya jātau agre kṛtvā hastaśabdaṃ murāreḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3297: evaṃ vadantī prīṇayantī ca devaṃ jagāmasā stotravacaḥ kadambaiḥ // GarP_3,25.31 //
GP12garup3_u:3298: devāstadā dunduṃbhayo vinedire tanmastake puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ ca cakruḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3299: tasminkāle ubhayoḥ pārśvayośca nṛtyaṃ cakrurdevatāvāranāryaḥ // GarP_3,25.32 //
GP12garup3_u:3300: tathaiva tāstalaśabdaṃ ca kṛtvā tadā sarvā namanaṃ cāpi cakruḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3301: ānandaśaile sarvadā tvitthameva sā sarvadā nartayantī ca vīndra // GarP_3,25.33 //
GP12garup3_u:3302: ānandamagnā sāpi devī jagāma svamāśramaṃ jaigiṣavyeṇa sārdham /
GP12garup3_u:3303: yātrāmevaṃ ye na kurvanti vīndra teṣāṃ ca sarvaṃ niṣphalaṃ cāhurāryāḥ // GarP_3,25.34 //
GP12garup3_u:3304: gatvāśramaṃ jaigiṣavyeṇa sārdhaṃ guruṃ tvapṛcchadveṅkaṭeśasya mantram /
GP12garup3_u:3305: mantrasyārthaṃ brūhi me jaigiṣavya mantrāvṛttiṃ kurvatāṃ vai phalāya // GarP_3,25.35 //
GP12garup3_u:3307: śṛṇuṣva bhadre veṅkaṭe śasya nāmnastvarthaṃ śrutvā hṛdaye saṃnidhatsva // GarP_3,25.36 //
GP12garup3_u:3312: vya (ve) mindriyādikaṃ proktaṃ vyaṅgabhūtaṃ harau yataḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3318: muktānāṃ ca samūhastu vyaṅkaṭeti prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,25.41 //
GP12garup3_u:3327: atastu vyaṅkaṭeśākhya evaṃ jñātvā japaṃ kuru // GarP_3,25.45 //
