GP12garup3_u:3329: nidrāṃ cakāra tatraiva rātrau pitrā sahaiva ca /
GP12garup3_u:3330: brāhme muhūrte cotthayi hṛdi sasmāra kanyakā // GarP_3,25.46 //
GP12garup3_u:3333: śrīraṅgaśāyī ca anantaśāyī kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam // GarP_3,25.47 //
GP12garup3_u:3335: nārāyaṇaḥ śrībadarīnivāsaḥ kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam // GarP_3,25.48 //
GP12garup3_u:3342: dvārāvatī kāśikāvantikā ca prayāgakāñcyau mathurāpurī ca /
GP12garup3_u:3343: māyāvatī hastimatī purī ca kurvantu sa dṛ // GarP_3,25.52 //
GP12garup3_u:3344: bhāgīrathī caiva sarasvatī ca godāvarī siṃdhukṛṣṇa ca veṇī /
GP12garup3_u:3345: kalindakanyā yamunā ca narmadā kurva dṛ // GarP_3,25.53 //
GP12garup3_u:3347: sutāmraparṇī ca pinākinī ca ku dṛ // GarP_3,25.54 //
GP12garup3_u:3350: gururvasiṣṭhaḥ kraturaṅgirāśca manuḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaśca gautamaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3351: raibhyo marīciścyavanaśca dakṣaḥ kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam // GarP_3,25.56 //
GP12garup3_u:3352: saptārṇavāḥ sapta kulācalāśca dvīpāśca saptopavanāni sapta /
GP12garup3_u:3353: bhūrādikāni bhuvanāni sapta kurvantu sa dṛ // GarP_3,25.57 //
GP12garup3_u:3354: māndhātrā nahuṣoṃbarīṣasagarau rājā nalo dharmarāṭ prahlādaḥ kraturāḍ vibhīṣaṇagayau vyāso hanūmānapi /
GP12garup3_u:3355: aśvatthāma kṛpāvumā drupadajā śrījānakī tārakā mandodaryakhilāḥ prabhātasumahaṃ kurvantu nityaṃ hare // GarP_3,25.58 //
GP12garup3_u:3356: aśvatthasya vanāni kiṃ ca tulasīdhātrīvanāni prabho punnāgasya vanāni caṃpakavanānyanyāni puṣpāṇi ca /
GP12garup3_u:3357: mandārasya vanāni yāni ca hareḥ saugandhikānyapyaho nityaṃ tāni diśantu matpramuditaṃ śrīveṅkaṭeśa prabho // GarP_3,25.59 //
GP12garup3_u:3358: evaṃ smṛtvā śrīnivāsasya devī kṛtvā śaucaṃ jaigiṣavyeṇa sākam /
GP12garup3_u:3359: snātuṃ yayau puṣkariṇīṃ hareśca snānaṃ samyak tatra cakāra deśe /
GP12garup3_u:3360: samyag japtvā vyaṅkaṭeśasya mantramuvāca sā jaigiṣavyaṃ guruṃ ca // GarP_3,25.60 //
GP12garup3_u:3361: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe devī kṛtaveṅkaṭeśadarśanatatstutyādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:3365: śrīnivāsaḥ kimarthaṃ vai āgatotra vadasva me /
GP12garup3_u:3367: svāmipuṣkariṇī cātra kimarthaṃ hyagatā vada // GarP_3,26.1 //
GP12garup3_u:3368: jaigīṣavya uvāca śṛṇu bhadre mahābhāge vyaṅkaṭeśasya cāgamam /
GP12garup3_u:3369: āvayordevi pāpāni viṣamaṃ yānti bhāmini // GarP_3,26.2 //
GP12garup3_u:3372: babhūva daityayonau ca devānāṃ kaṇṭako balī /
GP12garup3_u:3373: saṃjīvo vijayaḥ prokto haribhakto mahāprabhuḥ // GarP_3,26.4 //
GP12garup3_u:3379: tvaṃ mā dadasva duḥ khaṃ me pālayiṣyati kovidaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3380: kṣaṇamātraṃ na jīvāmi tvāṃ vinā jīvanaṃ na hi // GarP_3,26.7 //
GP12garup3_u:3381: mā tapa tvaṃ mahābhāga mama jīvanahetave /
GP12garup3_u:3383: hiraṇyākṣo mātaraṃ prāha jālaṃ hitvā viṣṇorbhajane 'laṃ kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:3384: mayisnehaṃ putrahetorvirūḍhaṃ sukhaduḥ khe ceha loke paratra // GarP_3,26.9 //
GP12garup3_u:3385: yāvatsnehaṃ mayi mātaḥ karoṣi tāvatkleśaṃ śāśvataṃ yāsyasi tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3386: mātaśca te mayi putratvabuddhistvayyapyeṣā mātṛbuddhirmamāpi // GarP_3,26.10 //
GP12garup3_u:3387: tāte pūjye pitṛbuddhirmamāsti tasmiṃstute bhartṛbuddhirhi mithyā /
GP12garup3_u:3388: nirmāti yasmāddharireva sarvaṃ samyak pātā niyato 'sau murāriḥ // GarP_3,26.11 //
GP12garup3_u:3389: ato hi mātā harireva sarvadā tvanyāsāṃ vai mātṛtā copacārāt /
GP12garup3_u:3390: nirmātṛtvaṃ yadi mukhyaṃ tvayi syāddroṇādīnāṃ jananī kā vadasva // GarP_3,26.12 //
GP12garup3_u:3391: mātṛtvaṃ vai yadi mukhyaṃ tvayi syāddhātrādīnāṃ jananī kā vadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3392: yataḥ sadā yāti jagattatto hariḥ sadā pitā viṣṇurajaḥ purāṇaḥ // GarP_3,26.13 //
GP12garup3_u:3393: sadā pitā mukhyapitā yadi syādgarbhasthabāle pālakaḥ ko vadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3394: mātāpitroḥ pālakatvaṃ yadi syātkūrmādīnāṃ pālakau kau vadasva // GarP_3,26.14 //
GP12garup3_u:3395: mātāpitroḥ pālakatvaṃ yadi syātkṛpādīnāṃ rakṣakau kau vadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3397: na tārakohaṃ narakācca subhrūrna vai bhartā nāpi pitrādayaśca /
GP12garup3_u:3398: na vai mātā nānujādiśca sarvaḥ sarvatrātā viṣṇurato na cānyaḥ // GarP_3,26.16 //
GP12garup3_u:3399: māyāṃ madīyāṃ jñānaśastreṇa cchitvā bhaktyā hareḥ smaraṇaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:3400: yadbhaktirūpūrvaṃ smaraṇaṃ nāma viṣṇostatsarvathā pāpaharaṃ ca mātaḥ // GarP_3,26.17 //
GP12garup3_u:3401: yo vā bhaktyā smaraṇaṃ nāma viṣṇoḥ karotyasau pāpaharo bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup3_u:3402: ayaṃ deho durllabhaḥ karmabhūmau tatrāpi madhye bhajanaṃ viṣṇumūrteḥ // GarP_3,26.18 //
GP12garup3_u:3403: āyurgataṃ vyarthameva tvadīyaṃ śīghraṃ bhajeḥ śrīnivāsasya pādam /
GP12garup3_u:3404: upadiśyaivaṃ mātaraṃ putravaryo daityāveśātsobhavadvai tapasvī // GarP_3,26.19 //
GP12garup3_u:3405: caturmukhaṃ prīṇayitvaiva bhaktyā hyavadhyatvaṃ prāpa tasmānmahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:3406: tato bhūmiṃ karavadveṣṭayitvā ninye tadā daityavaryo mahātmā // GarP_3,26.20 //
GP12garup3_u:3408: bhittvācābdhiṃ viviśe taṃ mahātmā rasātale saṃsthitaṃ bhūtalaṃ ca // GarP_3,26.21 //
GP12garup3_u:3410: taṃ karṇamūle tāḍayitvā jaghāna prasādayāmāsa ca pūrvavadbhuvam // GarP_3,26.22 //
GP12garup3_u:3411: sudiggajānsthāpayitvā ca viṣṇuḥ śrīmuṣṭe vai saṃsthitaḥ śrīvarāhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3412: tadā hariścintayāmāsa viṣṇurbhaktyā madīyaṃ mānuṣaṃ dehamadya // GarP_3,26.23 //
GP12garup3_u:3413: ārādhayiṣyanti ca māṃ kva ete teṣāṃ dayāṃ kutra vāhaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup3_u:3414: evaṃ hariścintayitvā sukanye vaikuṇṭhalokādacalaṃ śeṣa saṃjñam /
GP12garup3_u:3415: vīndraskandhe sthāpayitvā svayaṃ ca samāgatobhūdbhūtalaṃ bhūtaleśaḥ // GarP_3,26.24 //
GP12garup3_u:3417: śrīkṛṣṇaveṇīparyantaṃ sthāpayā māsa taṃ girim // GarP_3,26.25 //
GP12garup3_u:3418: gireḥ pucche tu śrīśailaṃ madhyame 'hobalaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup3_u:3419: mukhaṃ ca śrīnivāsasya kṣetraṃ ca samudāhṛtam // GarP_3,26.26 //
GP12garup3_u:3421: gaṅgādisarvatīrthāni puṇyāni hyatra saṃti vai // GarP_3,26.27 //
GP12garup3_u:3424: putrārthī putramāpnoti nṛpo rājyaṃ ca vindati /
GP12garup3_u:3432: vyaṅkaṭeśasya śailasya māhātmyaṃ yāvadasti hi // GarP_3,26.32 //
GP12garup3_u:3434: vyaṅkaṭādrau parāṃ bhaktiṃ ye kurvanti dinedine /
GP12garup3_u:3436: mūko vāgmī bhavedeva badhiraḥ śrāvako bhavet /
GP12garup3_u:3437: vandhyā syādbahuputrā ca nirdhanaḥ sadhano bhavet // GarP_3,26.34 //
GP12garup3_u:3439: tattvato vyaṅkaṭādrestu svarūpaṃ vetti ko bhuvi // GarP_3,26.35 //
GP12garup3_u:3440: yasmādasya gireḥ puṇyaṃ māhātmyaṃ vetti yaḥ pumān /
GP12garup3_u:3447: snānaṃ kurvanti ye tatra teṣāṃ muktiḥ kare sthitā /
GP12garup3_u:3449: tāni sarvāṇi tatraiva saṃti tīrthe hareḥ sadā // GarP_3,26.39 //
GP12garup3_u:3456: tīrthānāṃ snānamātreṇa mokṣaṃ yāntīti ye viduḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3457: te sarve asurā jñeyāste yānti hyadhamāṃ gatim // GarP_3,26.43 //
GP12garup3_u:3459: āste vāyuḥ sadā viṣṇoḥ pūjāṃ kartumanuttamām // GarP_3,26.44 //
GP12garup3_u:3463: ye veṣṇavā vaiṣṇavadāsavaryāḥ snānaṃ suryustatra pūrvaṃ sukanye /
GP12garup3_u:3464: madhvāntasthāḥ śrīnivāsastu nityamatra snānātprīyatāṃ me dayāluḥ // GarP_3,26.46 //
GP12garup3_u:3465: ye madhvatīrthe snātumicchanti devi rudrādayo vāyubhaktā mahāntaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3466: sadā snānaṃ tatra kurvanti devi prātaḥ kāle codayātpūrvameva // GarP_3,26.47 //
GP12garup3_u:3467: ye vāyutīrthe visṛjanti dehajaṃ malaṃ mūtraṃ vamanaṃ śleṣmakaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3468: ye 'pānaśuddhiṃ liṅgaśuddhiṃ ca kanye kurvanti te hyasurā rākṣasāśca // GarP_3,26.48 //
GP12garup3_u:3469: śṛṇvanti ye bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ kiṃ varṇaye tasya puṇyaṃ tu devi /
GP12garup3_u:3470: ye kṛṣṇamantraṃ tu japanti devi hyaṣṭā kṣaraṃ mantravaraṃ sugopyam // GarP_3,26.49 //
GP12garup3_u:3471: teṣāṃ hariḥ prīyate keśavolaṃ madhvāntastho nātra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:3472: evaṃ dānaṃ tatra kurvanti ye vai dvijāgryāṇāṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ vidāṃ ca // GarP_3,26.50 //
GP12garup3_u:3473: teṣāṃ puṇyaṃ naiva jānanti devā jānātyevaṃ śrīnivāso haristu /
GP12garup3_u:3474: śālagrāmaṃ vāyutīrthe dadante teṣāṃ puṇyaṃ vetti sa vyaṅkaṭeśaḥ // GarP_3,26.51 //
GP12garup3_u:3475: sudurlabho vāyutīrthe 'bhiṣeko niṣkāmabuddhyā vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca devi /
GP12garup3_u:3476: tatrāpi tīrthe labhyate bhāgyayogādbhāgavatasya śravaṇaṃ viṣṇudāsaiḥ // GarP_3,26.52 //
GP12garup3_u:3477: tathaiva tīrthe durlabhaṃ tatra devi śālagrāmasya dvijavarye ca dānam /
GP12garup3_u:3480: jānārdanīṃ mūrtimāhurmahānto dānaṃ tasyā durlabhaṃ tatra tīrthe // GarP_3,26.54 //
GP12garup3_u:3481: atyuttamaṃ mūrtidānaṃ tu bhadre sudurllabhaṃ paramaṃ nātra lobhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3482: sudurlabhaṃ bahudogdhyāśca gṛṣṭerdānaṃ tathā vastraratnādikānām // GarP_3,26.55 //
GP12garup3_u:3483: atyuttamaṃ dravyadānaṃ ca devi svāpekṣitaṃ dānamāhurmahāntaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3484: svasyānapekṣaṃ phaladānaṃ ca vastrādānaṃ tasya vyarthamāhurmahāntaḥ // GarP_3,26.56 //
GP12garup3_u:3485: atyuttamaṃ gṛṣṭidānaṃ ca puṇyaṃ naivāpyate dugdhadohāśca gāvaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3486: atyuttame vastradāne subuddhiḥ sudurghaṭā paramā vai janānām // GarP_3,26.57 //
GP12garup3_u:3487: atyuttamaṃ bhāgavatasya pustakaṃ sudurghaṭaṃ vāyutīrthaṃ ca kanye /
GP12garup3_u:3488: atyuttamaṃ dravyadānaṃ ca devi sudurghaṭaṃ vāyutīrthaṃ nṛṇāṃ hi /
GP12garup3_u:3489: sudurlabho vaiṣṇavaistattvavidbhirharervicāro vāyutīrthe ca kanye // GarP_3,26.58 //
GP12garup3_u:3491: candratīrtha miti proktaṃ tatrāste candramāḥ sadā // GarP_3,26.59 //
GP12garup3_u:3492: śrīnivāsasya pūjāṃ ca tatra sthitvā karotyayam /
GP12garup3_u:3493: tatra snānaṃ prakurvanti puṇyadeśe ca kanyake // GarP_3,26.60 //
GP12garup3_u:3495: tatra snātvā pūrvabhāge śālagrāmaṃ dadāti yaḥ // GarP_3,26.61 //
GP12garup3_u:3499: prasannavadanaṃ sūkṣmaṃ susnigdhaṃ kanyake śubhe // GarP_3,26.63 //
GP12garup3_u:3506: lakṣmīnārāyaṇasamāṃ tāṃ mūrtiṃ viddhi bhāmini // GarP_3,26.66 //
GP12garup3_u:3507: sudurlabhaṃ tasya mūrteśca dānaṃ taccandratīrthe śravaṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3508: samyak svarūpaṃ dadhivāmanasya sudurghaṭaṃ śravaṇaṃ vaiṣṇavācca // GarP_3,26.67 //
GP12garup3_u:3509: tatra snātvā vāmanasya svarūpaśravaṇādvidurdānaphalaṃ samaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3511: madhyāhne durlabhaṃ snānaṃ nṛṇāṃ tatra sumaṅgale /
GP12garup3_u:3512: tatra sthitvā dhanyanaraḥ sadā bhajati vai harim // GarP_3,26.69 //
GP12garup3_u:3516: devasya vāmabhāge ca madhyadeśaṃ vihāya ca // GarP_3,26.71 //
GP12garup3_u:3519: pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhūvarāhasya marterdānaṃ dattvā śravaṇaṃ cāpi kṛtvā /
GP12garup3_u:3520: tatra sthitaṃ bhūvarāhaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sa vai naraḥ kṛtakṛtyo hi loke // GarP_3,26.73 //
GP12garup3_u:3521: tatra snātvā bhūvarāhasya marteḥ śṛṇoti yo lakṣaṇaṃ samyageva /
GP12garup3_u:3522: sa tena puṇyaṃ samupaiti devi sa muktibhāṅ nātra vicāryamasti // GarP_3,26.74 //
GP12garup3_u:3523: īśānakoṇe śrīnivāsasya devi raudraṃ tīrthaṃ paramaṃ pāvanaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3524: tatra sthitvā rudradevo mahātmā pūjāṃ karoti śrīnivāsasya nityam // GarP_3,26.75 //
GP12garup3_u:3525: hastāṣṭakaṃ tatpramāṇaṃ vadanti tatra snānaṃ vaiṣṇavaiḥ kāryameva /
GP12garup3_u:3526: tatra snātvā prayato vai murāreḥ kathāṃ divyāṃ śṛṇuyādādareṇa /
GP12garup3_u:3527: snānaṃ pānaṃ tatra dānaṃ ca kuryāllakṣmīnṛsiṃhaprīyate devi nityam3,26.76 //
GP12garup3_u:3533: etā dṛśaṃ gaṇḍikāyāḥ śilāyā mūrterdānaṃ durghaṭaṃ viddhi vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:3534: tatra snātvā śrīnṛsiṃhasvarūpaṃ lakṣmīpateḥ śṛṇuyādbhaktiyuktaḥ // GarP_3,26.80 //
GP12garup3_u:3535: mūrterdānātphalamāpnoti devi satyaṃsatyaṃ nātra vicāryamasti // GarP_3,26.81 //
GP12garup3_u:3537: durlabhaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ tu snānaṃ sarvārthasādhakam // GarP_3,26.82 //
GP12garup3_u:3538: śālagrāmasya dānaṃ tu durlabhaṃ tatra vai nṛṇām /
GP12garup3_u:3541: chattrākāraṃ vartulaṃ ca prasannavadanaṃ śubham // GarP_3,26.84 //
GP12garup3_u:3543: savye dakṣiṇapārśve ca samayoḥ puṣkalānvitam // GarP_3,26.85 //
GP12garup3_u:3548: kalau nṛṇāṃ tasya lābho durlabhaḥ saṃsmṛto bhuvi /
GP12garup3_u:3549: dānaṃ ca sutarāṃ devi darlabhaṃ kiṃ vadāmi te // GarP_3,26.88 //
GP12garup3_u:3550: brahmatīrthe ca saṃsnāya śrotavyā vai hareḥ kathā /
GP12garup3_u:3552: lakṣaṇaṃ yo vijānāti tadā tatsadṛśaṃ phalam /
GP12garup3_u:3553: prāpnotyeva na saṃdeho nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,26.90 //
GP12garup3_u:3555: śrīnivāsasya pūjāṃ tu kartumāste śacīpatiḥ // GarP_3,26.91 //
GP12garup3_u:3559: dadāti bhūtale bhadre bhūpateḥ sadṛśo bhavet // GarP_3,26.93 //
GP12garup3_u:3567: etādṛśaṃ tu vai bhadre sītārāmābhidhaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,26.97 //
GP12garup3_u:3569: durlabhaṃ tu kalau nṝṇāṃ svasāmrājyapradaṃ śubham // GarP_3,26.98 //
GP12garup3_u:3571: yā taddānaṃ durlabhaṃ tannālpasya tapasaḥ phalam // GarP_3,26.99 //
GP12garup3_u:3572: dānasya śaktyabhāve tu śrotavyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ hareḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3574: āgneyakoṇe śrīnivāsasya devi tīrthaṃ tvāste vahnisaṃjñaṃ suśastam /
GP12garup3_u:3575: sa vahnidevaḥ śrīnivāsasya pūjāṃ kartuṃ hyāste sarvadā tīrthamadhye // GarP_3,26.101 //
GP12garup3_u:3576: yo vā tīrthe vahnisaṃjñe ca devi bhaktyā snānaṃ kurute 'jaṃ smaranhi /
GP12garup3_u:3577: jñānadvārā mokṣamāpnoti devi tatra snānaṃ durllabhaṃ vai nṛṇāṃ ca // GarP_3,26.102 //
GP12garup3_u:3578: jñātvā snānaṃ duṣkaraṃ tīrtharāje bhaktistasmindurllabhā caiva devi /
GP12garup3_u:3579: śālagrāme tacchilāyāśca dānaṃ sudurlabhaṃ vāsudevābhidhāyāḥ // GarP_3,26.103 //
GP12garup3_u:3580: hrasvaṃ tathā vartulaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ mukhaṃ mukhacakraṃ suśuddham /
GP12garup3_u:3581: suveṇuyuktaṃ vāsudevābhidheyaṃ dānaṃ kalau durlabhaṃ tasya bhadre // GarP_3,26.104 //
GP12garup3_u:3582: dāne tasyāḥ śaktya bhāve ca devi snātvā tīrthe vāsudevābhidhasya /
GP12garup3_u:3583: samyak śrāvyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai śilāyāstayostulyaṃ phalamāhurmahāntaḥ // GarP_3,26.105 //
GP12garup3_u:3585: tatrāste yamarājastu pūjāṃ kartuṃ hareḥ sadā // GarP_3,26.106 //
GP12garup3_u:3586: tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ cāpyakṣayaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup3_u:3593: paṭṭavardhanarāmaṃ tu yo dadāti ca tatra vai /
GP12garup3_u:3594: paṭṭābhiṣikto bhavati nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,26.110 //
GP12garup3_u:3596: āste hi nirṛtistatra pūjāṃ kurtuṃ ca sarvadā // GarP_3,26.111 //
GP12garup3_u:3597: tatra snānaṃ prakartavyaṃ punarjanma na vidyate /
GP12garup3_u:3599: mūrtiṃ dadāti yo martyaḥ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup3_u:3603: tanmūrtidānaṃ durlabhaṃ tatra devaḥ prīṇāti yasmācchrīnivāso mahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:3604: yadā dānaṃ durghaṭaṃ syācca devi tadā śrotavyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tasya mūrteḥ // GarP_3,26.115 //
GP12garup3_u:3606: tatra snātvā śeṣamūrtiṃ pradadāti dvijātaye // GarP_3,26.116 //
GP12garup3_u:3615: iha loke paratrāpi mokṣadā nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3616: navacakrādupakramya viṃśatyantaṃ ca yatra saḥ // GarP_3,26.121 //
GP12garup3_u:3618: viśvaṃbharaḥ sa vijñeyo viṃśatyūrdhvaṃ varānane // GarP_3,26.122 //
GP12garup3_u:3620: kalau tu durlabhaṃ naṇāṃ taddānaṃ cātidurlabham // GarP_3,26.123 //
GP12garup3_u:3622: eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śrutvā prayāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_3,26.124 //
GP12garup3_u:3624: tatrāste varuṇo devaḥ pūjāṃ kartuṃ hareḥ sadā // GarP_3,26.125 //
GP12garup3_u:3626: śiśumāraṃ ca matsyaṃ ca trivikramamathāpi vā /
GP12garup3_u:3629: cakratrayā ca vadane pucchopari sacakrakā // GarP_3,26.127 //
GP12garup3_u:3633: eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śrutvā vāruṇe tīrtha uttame // GarP_3,26.129 //
GP12garup3_u:3635: pūrvauktā mūrtayo yasmin gṛhe tiṣṭhanti bhāmini /
GP12garup3_u:3636: bhāgīrathī tīrthavarā saṃnidhatte na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,26.130 //
GP12garup3_u:3637: svāmi puṣkariṇīsnānaṃ durghaṭaṃ tu kalau nṛṇām /
GP12garup3_u:3638: tatra sthitānāṃ tīrthānāṃ snānaṃ cāpyatidurghaṭam // GarP_3,26.131 //
GP12garup3_u:3643: snānaṃ kuru yathānyā yaṃ śayyādānaṃ tathā kuru /
GP12garup3_u:3644: jaigīṣavyena muninā tvevamuktā ca kanyakā // GarP_3,26.134 //
GP12garup3_u:3646: tīrtheṣveteṣu susnātā dānaṃ cakre subhāminī // GarP_3,26.135 //
GP12garup3_u:3647: uvāsa tatra sā davī triḥ saptakandināni ca /
GP12garup3_u:3649: sa yāti paramāṃ bhaktiṃ śrīnivāse jaganmaye // GarP_3,26.136 //
GP12garup3_u:3650: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe vyaṅkaṭagirimāhātmye svāmipuṣkariṇyāditīrthatatratyadevatadīyaśālagrāmalakṣaṇa taddānādivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:3655: papraccha taṃ guruṃ vipraṃ vinayāvanatā sudhīḥ // GarP_3,27.1 //
GP12garup3_u:3656: kinnāmeyaṃ nadī vipra kiṃ kāryaṃ cātra me vada /
GP12garup3_u:3660: iyaṃ nadī mahābhāge sadā pāpavināśinī // GarP_3,27.3 //
GP12garup3_u:3662: pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate hyatra snānaṃ kartuṃ samudyataiḥ // GarP_3,27.4 //
GP12garup3_u:3664: yāvacchubhrodakaṃ devi tāvatsanānaṃ ca kārayet // GarP_3,27.5 //
GP12garup3_u:3666: śuddhodake samāyāte pāpaṃ naṣṭamiti dhruvam // GarP_3,27.6 //
GP12garup3_u:3668: atra snānaṃ prakartavyaṃ dātavyaṃ dāna muttamam /
GP12garup3_u:3669: tataśca jñānamāsādya viviṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_3,27.7 //
GP12garup3_u:3673: sūtasya hananādrāmo nirmukto hyatra bhāmini // GarP_3,27.9 //
GP12garup3_u:3674: nānena sadṛśaṃ tīrthaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup3_u:3675: snānaṃ kuru mahābhāge tena siddhiṃ hyavāpsyasi // GarP_3,27.10 //
GP12garup3_u:3676: jaigīṣavyeṇa muninā pitrā saha ca kanyakā /
GP12garup3_u:3678: yāvacca pauruṣaṃ sūktaṃ tāvatkālaṃ hi tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup3_u:3682: kumārīmahimānaṃ ca śrutvā snānaṃ cakāra sā /
GP12garup3_u:3683: punarāvṛtya sā devī hyantarā virajānadīm // GarP_3,27.14 //
GP12garup3_u:3684: dṛṣṭvā papraccha sā devī jaigīṣavyaṃ guruṃ prabhum /
GP12garup3_u:3685: kiṃ saṃjñikeyaṃ viprendra kiṃ kāryaṃ hyatra me vada // GarP_3,27.15 //
GP12garup3_u:3687: iyaṃ bhāgīrathī kanye āyāti hyantareṇa tu // GarP_3,27.16 //
GP12garup3_u:3689: kanye tvasyāstu salilaṃ śrīninivāsapriyaṃ sadā // GarP_3,27.17 //
GP12garup3_u:3690: atra snānaṃ yaḥ karoti sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup3_u:3691: snānaṃ cakāra sā kanyā jale paramapāvane // GarP_3,27.18 //
GP12garup3_u:3692: dānādikaṃ tathā jñātvā jajāpa paramaṃ manum /
GP12garup3_u:3697: snānaṃ kṛtvā mahābhāgā yayau tuṃburusaṃjñikām // GarP_3,27.21 //
GP12garup3_u:3698: papraccha taṃ guruṃ devī nāthaṃ kinnāmikā tvayam /
GP12garup3_u:3700: iyaṃ tuṃbarukābhijñā nārī vai varavarṇinī // GarP_3,27.22 //
GP12garup3_u:3701: purā tuṃ buruṇā sākaṃ nāradastapasi sthitaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3703: snānaṃ yaḥ kurute hyatra sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup3_u:3704: atra snānaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ durlabhaṃ kalau // GarP_3,27.24 //
GP12garup3_u:3705: atra snānaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ nālpasya tapasaḥ phalam /
GP12garup3_u:3706: tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca dattvā dānānyakeśaḥ // GarP_3,27.25 //
GP12garup3_u:3707: punarāgatya sā devī śrīnivāsaṃ nanāma ha /
GP12garup3_u:3713: kapilākhyordhvadeśe tu tattīrthaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,27.28 //
GP12garup3_u:3716: tata ūrdhvaṃ mahābhāgā yayau tatra dadarśa sā /
GP12garup3_u:3717: pañcāyudhānāṃ tīrthāni teṣu snānaṃ cakāra sā // GarP_3,27.30 //
GP12garup3_u:3720: saptarṣīṇāṃ tadūrdhvaṃ tu puṇyatīrthaṃ ca satphalam /
GP12garup3_u:3722: eteṣāṃ caiva māhātmyaṃ ko vā vaktumihārhati /
GP12garup3_u:3723: ṛṣitīrtheṣu sā kanyā cacāra tapa uttamam // GarP_3,27.33 //
GP12garup3_u:3725: yogadhāraṇa yā dehaṃ tyaktvā jāṃbavato gṛhe // GarP_3,27.34 //
GP12garup3_u:3726: jātā jāṃbavatī nāma vavṛdhe tasya veśmani /
GP12garup3_u:3728: rukmyā anaṃ tarā saiṣā mama bhāryā khageśvara // GarP_3,27.35 //
GP12garup3_u:3730: ko vā varṇayituṃ śakto madanyaḥ puruṣo bhuvi // GarP_3,27.36 //
GP12garup3_u:3731: veṅkaṭeśasya naivedyaṃ sadā lakṣmīḥ karoti vai /
GP12garup3_u:3732: brahmā pūjayate nityamevaṃ śāstrasya nirṇayaḥ // GarP_3,27.37 //
GP12garup3_u:3735: grāhyameva na saṃdeho anyathā nārakī bhavet // GarP_3,27.38 //
GP12garup3_u:3736: śrīnivāsātparo devo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup3_u:3739: idaṃ tu paramaṃ gopyaṃ tavoktaṃ ca khageśvara /
GP12garup3_u:3741: itaḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi tāratamyaṃ śṛṇu prabho // GarP_3,27.40 //
GP12garup3_u:3742: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe utta dṛ tṛ dṛ brahma dṛ kanyākṛtanānātīrthayātrādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:3745: yā pūrvasarge dakṣaputrī satī tu rudrasya patnī dakṣayajñe svadeham /
GP12garup3_u:3746: visṛjya sā menakāyāṃ ca jajñe dharādharāddhemavato vai sakāśāt // GarP_3,28.1 //
GP12garup3_u:3747: sā pārvatā rudrapatnī khagendra yā śeṣapatnī vāruṇī nāma pūrvā /
GP12garup3_u:3748: saivāgatā balabhadreṇa rantuṃ dvirūpamāsthāya mahāpativratā // GarP_3,28.2 //
GP12garup3_u:3749: śrīrityākhyā indirāveśayuktā tasyā dvitīyā pratimā megharūpā /
GP12garup3_u:3750: śeṣaṇa rūpeṇa yadā hi vīndra tapaścacāra viṣṇunā sārdhameva // GarP_3,28.3 //
GP12garup3_u:3751: tadaiva devī vāruṇī śeṣapatnī tapaśca kre indirāprītaye ca /
GP12garup3_u:3752: tadā prītā indirā suprasannā uvāca tāṃ vāruṇīṃ śeṣapatnīm // GarP_3,28.4 //
GP12garup3_u:3753: yadā rāmo vaiṣṇavāṃśena yuktaḥ saṃpatsyate bhūtale rauhiṇeyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3754: mayyāveśātsaṃyutā tvaṃ tu bhadre śrīrityākhyā valabhadrasya rantum // GarP_3,28.5 //
GP12garup3_u:3755: saṃpatsyase nātra vicāryamastītyuktvā sā vai prayayau viṣṇuloke /
GP12garup3_u:3756: śrīlakṣmyaṃśācchrīritīḍyāṃ samākhyāṃ labdhvā loke śeṣapatnī babhūva // GarP_3,28.6 //
GP12garup3_u:3757: yadāhīśo vipulāmuddharecca tadā rāmaḥ śrībhidāsaṃgame ca /
GP12garup3_u:3758: karoti toṣatsarvadā vai ramāyāstasyāpyāveśo vyaṃstritamonasaṃgam // GarP_3,28.7 //
GP12garup3_u:3759: yā revatī raivatasyaiva putrī sā vāruṇī balabhadrasya patnī /
GP12garup3_u:3760: sauparṇanāmnī balapatnī khagendra yāstāstisraḥ ṣaḍviṣṇośca strībhyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3761: dviguṇādhamā rudraśeṣādikebhyo daśādhamā tvaṃ vijānīhi pautra // GarP_3,28.8 //
GP12garup3_u:3763: rāmeṇa rantuṃ sarvadā vāruṇī tu putrītvamāpe revatasyaiva subhrūḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3764: evaṃ trirūpā vāruṇī śeṣapatnī dvirūpabhūtā pārvatī rudrapatnī // GarP_3,28.9 //
GP12garup3_u:3766: śrūyate ca mayā kṛṣṇa nimittaṃ brūhi me prabho // GarP_3,28.10 //
GP12garup3_u:3768: evaṃ tvayoktaṃ bhagavanniścayārthaṃ mama prabho // GarP_3,28.11 //
GP12garup3_u:3769: revatī śrīyutā śrīśca śeṣarūpā ca vāruṇī /
GP12garup3_u:3770: sauparṇi pārvatī caiva tisraḥ śeṣāśato varāḥ // GarP_3,28.12 //
GP12garup3_u:3772: nimittaṃ brūhi me kṛṣṇa tavaśiṣyāya suvrata // GarP_3,28.13 //
GP12garup3_u:3775: uttamānāṃ ca sāmyaṃ tu uttamāveśato bhavet // GarP_3,28.14 //
GP12garup3_u:3778: yathā mayocyate vīndra tathā jānīhi nānyathā /
GP12garup3_u:3781: vṛtrādīnāṃ śarīraṃ tu puramityucyate budhaiḥ // GarP_3,28.17 //
GP12garup3_u:3785: mantradyumnastato loke ubhāvapyeka eva tu // GarP_3,28.19 //
GP12garup3_u:3789: caturthepi ca vāyośca viśeṣosti sadārjuna // GarP_3,28.21 //
GP12garup3_u:3793: vedoktamantrā gāḥ proktā dhiyā saṃdhārayedyataḥ // GarP_3,28.23 //
GP12garup3_u:3797: viśeṣeṇa hariṃ kukṣau vijñānācca hariḥ sadā // GarP_3,28.25 //
GP12garup3_u:3799: rāmaputraḥ kuśaḥ prokta indra eva prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,28.26 //
GP12garup3_u:3801: ataḥ kuśa iti prokto jānakīnandanaḥ prabhuḥ // GarP_3,28.27 //
GP12garup3_u:3803: vikukṣiḥ kuśa evaite sapta cendrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,28.28 //
GP12garup3_u:3804: yaḥ kṛṣṇaputtraḥ pradyumnaḥ kāma eva prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3811: yo rudraputraḥ skandastu kāma eva prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,28.32 //
GP12garup3_u:3812: ripūnāskaṃ date nityamataḥ skanda iti smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3814: kāmāvatāro vijñeyo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,28.33 //
GP12garup3_u:3815: sudarśanaśca paramaḥ pradyumnaḥ sāṃba eva ca /
GP12garup3_u:3818: tayormadhye tu garuḍa kāma indrādhamaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,28.35 //
GP12garup3_u:3824: sa evābhūddhareḥ sevāṃ kartuṃ rāmānujo bhuvi // GarP_3,28.38 //
GP12garup3_u:3828: evaṃ dvirūpo vijñeyo hyaniruddho mahāmatiḥ // GarP_3,28.40 //
GP12garup3_u:3832: duryodhanasya yā putrī lakṣaṇā sā ratiḥ smṛtā // GarP_3,28.42 //
GP12garup3_u:3833: kāṣṭhā sāṃbasya bhāryā sā lakṣaṇaṃ saṃyunaktyataḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3835: evaṃ dvirūpā vijñeyā kāmabhāryā ratiḥ smṛtā /
GP12garup3_u:3837: rājadharmeṇa viṣṇośca jātaḥ prīṇayituṃ hareḥ // GarP_3,28.44 //
GP12garup3_u:3839: rāmāvatāre bharatākhyo babhūva hyaṃbhojajāveśayuto bṛhaspatiḥ // GarP_3,28.45 //
GP12garup3_u:3841: ato hyasau nāranāmā babhūva hyaṅgatvamāptuṃ rāmadevasya bhūmyām // GarP_3,28.46 //
GP12garup3_u:3843: yasmāddoṇātsaṃbhabhūva guruśca tasmādasau droṇasaṃjño babhūva // GarP_3,28.47 //
GP12garup3_u:3844: bhūbhārabhūtādyuddhṛtau hyaṅgabhūto viṣṇoḥ sevāṃ kartumevāsa bhūmau /
GP12garup3_u:3846: yasmādutkṛṣṭo hariratra samyagato hyasau budhavannāma cāpa /
GP12garup3_u:3847: sakhā hyabhūtkṛṣṇadevasya nityaṃ mahāmatiḥ sarvalokeṣu pujvaḥ // GarP_3,28.49 //
GP12garup3_u:3849: kanyāṃ sṛṣṭvā hareḥ prīṇannāsa bhūmā prajāpatiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3851: śacīṃ bharyāṃ devarājasya viddhi tasyā hyavatāraṃ śṛṇu samyak khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:3852: rāmāvatāre nāma tārā babhūva sā vālipatnī śacīsajakā ca // GarP_3,28.51 //
GP12garup3_u:3853: rāmānmṛte vālisaṃjñe patau hi sugrīvasaṃgaṃ sā cakārātha tārā /
GP12garup3_u:3854: ato nāgātsvargalokaṃ ca tārā kva vā yāyādantarikṣe na pāpā // GarP_3,28.52 //
GP12garup3_u:3855: kṛṣṇāvatāre saiva tārā ca vīndra babhūva bhūmau vijayasya patnī /
GP12garup3_u:3856: piśaṅgadeti hyabhidhā syācca tasyāḥ sāmīpyamasyāstvajuṃnaveva cāsīt // GarP_3,28.53 //
GP12garup3_u:3857: utpādayitvā babhruvāhaṃ ca putraṃ tasyāṃ tyaktvā hyarjuno vai mahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:3858: ataścobhe vāracitrāṅgade ca śacīrūpe nātra vivāryamasti // GarP_3,28.54 //
GP12garup3_u:3859: pulomajā mantradyumnasya bhāryā yā kāśikā gādhirājasya bhāryā /
GP12garup3_u:3860: vikukṣibhāryā sumatiśceti saṃjñā kuśasya patnī kāntimatīti saṃjñā // GarP_3,28.55 //
GP12garup3_u:3861: etā hi sapta hyavarāśca śacyā jānīhi vai nāsti vicāraṇātra /
GP12garup3_u:3864: atha yaḥ pravaho vāyurmukhyavāyoḥ suto balī /
GP12garup3_u:3865: sa vāyuṣu mahānadya sa vai koṇādhipastathā // GarP_3,28.57 //
GP12garup3_u:3866: nāsikāsu sa evokto bhautikastulya eva ca /
GP12garup3_u:3867: ativāhaḥ sa evoktaḥ yato gamyo mumukṣubhiḥ // GarP_3,28.58 //
GP12garup3_u:3870: pravahaśceti saṃjñāṃ sa kimarthaṃ prāpa tadvada // GarP_3,28.59 //
GP12garup3_u:3871: arthaḥ kaścāsti tannāmnaḥ pratītastaṃ vadasva me /
GP12garup3_u:3873: uvāca paramaprītaḥ saṃstūya garuḍaṃ hariḥ // GarP_3,28.60 //
GP12garup3_u:3878: mayoktametattu satyaṃ na mithyā gṛhṇāmi hastenoragaṃ kopayuktam // GarP_3,28.62 //
GP12garup3_u:3879: sarvaṃ nu satyaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatuhyahīndraḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3881: etasya saṃdhāraṇādeva vīndra sa vāyuputraḥ pravahetyāpa saṃjñām /
GP12garup3_u:3882: yo vā loke viṣṇumūrtiṃ vihāya daityasvarūpā reṇukādyāḥ kudevāḥ // GarP_3,28.64 //
GP12garup3_u:3883: teṣāṃ tathā matpitṝṇāṃ ca pūjā vyarthā satyaṃ satyametadbravīmi /
GP12garup3_u:3884: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatu hyahīndraḥ // GarP_3,28.65 //
GP12garup3_u:3885: pitryaṃ nayāmi pravihāyaiva ye tu pitruddeśātkevalaṃ yaḥ karoti /
GP12garup3_u:3886: sa pāpātmā narakānvai prayātītyetadvākyaṃ satyametadbravīmi // GarP_3,28.66 //
GP12garup3_u:3887: na śrīḥ svatantrā nāpi vidhiḥ svatantro na vāyudevo nāpi śivaḥ svatantraḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3888: tadanye no gauripuloma jādyāḥ kiṃ vaktavyaṃ nātra loke svatantraḥ // GarP_3,28.67 //
GP12garup3_u:3889: bravīmi satyaṃ puruṣo viṣṇureva satyaṃ satya bhujamuddhṛtya satyam /
GP12garup3_u:3890: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatu hyahīndra // GarP_3,28.68 //
GP12garup3_u:3891: jīvaśca satyaḥ paramātmā ca satyastayorbhedaḥ satye e tatsadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:3892: jaḍaścasatyo jīvajaḍayośca bhedo bhedaḥ satyaḥ kiṃ ca jaḍaiśayorbhidā // GarP_3,28.69 //
GP12garup3_u:3893: bhedaḥ satyaḥ sarvajīveṣu nityaṃ satyā jaḍānāṃ ca bhedā sadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:3894: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau daśatu māṃ hyahīndraḥ // GarP_3,28.70 //
GP12garup3_u:3896: etasya saṃdhāraṇādevavīdre sā vāyuputraḥ pravahetyāpa saṃjñām // GarP_3,28.71 //
GP12garup3_u:3897: dvayaṃ svarūpaṃ praviditvaiva pūrvaṃ tvaṃ svīkuruṣva dvayameva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:3898: snānādikaṃ ca prakaroti nityaṃ pāpī sa ātmā naiva mokṣaṃ prayāti // GarP_3,28.72 //
GP12garup3_u:3899: tasmāddvayaṃ pravicāryaiva nityaṃ sukhī bhavennātra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:3900: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatu hyahīndraḥ // GarP_3,28.73 //
GP12garup3_u:3902: kiṃ taddvayaṃ devadeveśa kiṃ vā tatkāraṇaṃ kīdṛśaṃ me vadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3903: dvayostyāgaṃ kīdṛśaṃ me vadasva tyāgātsukhaṃ kīdṛśaṃ me vadasva // GarP_3,28.74 //
GP12garup3_u:3905: dvayaṃ cāhustvindriye dve baliṣṭhe dehe hyasmiñ śrotranetre susṛṣṭe /
GP12garup3_u:3906: avāntare śrotranetre khagendra dvayaṃ cāhustatsvarūpaṃ ca vakṣye // GarP_3,28.75 //
GP12garup3_u:3907: śrotrasvabhāvo loka vārtāśrutau ca hyatīva modastvādarāsvādanena /
GP12garup3_u:3908: harervārtāśravaṇe duḥ khajālaṃ śrotrasvabhāvo jaḍatā damaśca // GarP_3,28.76 //
GP12garup3_u:3909: netrasvabhāvo darśane strīnarāṇāṃ hyatyādarānnāsti nidrādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3910: harerbhaktānāṃ darśane duḥ kharūpo viṣṇoḥ pūjādarśane duḥ khajālam // GarP_3,28.77 //
GP12garup3_u:3911: tayoḥ svarūpaṃ praviditvaiva pūrvaṃ punaḥ punaḥ svīkarotyeva mūḍhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3912: śiśraṃ maurkhyāccaiva kutrāpi yonau praveśayetsarvadā hyādareṇa // GarP_3,28.78 //
GP12garup3_u:3913: bhayaṃ ca lajjā naiva cāste vadhūnāṃ tathā nṛṇāṃ vanitānāṃ yatīnām /
GP12garup3_u:3914: svasāraṃ te hyaviditvā dinepi suvāma yajñena svābhāvaśca vīndra // GarP_3,28.79 //
GP12garup3_u:3916: tatho pahārasya ca tatsvabhāvaḥ abhakṣyāṇāṃ bhakṣaṇe tatsvabhāvaḥ // GarP_3,28.80 //
GP12garup3_u:3917: alehyalehasya ca tatsvabhāvaḥ pātuṃ tvapeyasya ca tatsvabhāvaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3918: dvayoḥ svarūpaṃ ca vihāya mūḍhaḥ punaḥ punaḥ svīkarotyeva nityam // GarP_3,28.81 //
GP12garup3_u:3919: tasya snānaṃ vyarthamāhuśca yasmāttasmāttyājyaṃ na dvayoḥ kāryameva /
GP12garup3_u:3920: abhiprāyaṃ hyetamevaṃ khagendra jānīhi tvaṃ prahasyaiva nityam // GarP_3,28.82 //
GP12garup3_u:3921: bhāryādvayaṃ hyaviditvā svarūpaṃ svīkṛtya caikāṃ pravihāyaiva caikām /
GP12garup3_u:3922: snānādikaṃ kurute mūḍhabūddhiḥ vyarthaṃ cāhurmokṣabhogau ca naiva /
GP12garup3_u:3923: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatu hyahīndraḥ // GarP_3,28.83 //
GP12garup3_u:3925: bhāryādvayaṃ kiṃ vada tvaṃ mamāpi tayoḥ svarūpaṃ kiṃ vada tvaṃ murāre /
GP12garup3_u:3926: tayormadhye grāhyabhāryāṃ vada tvamagrāhyabhāryāṃ cāpi samyagvada tvam // GarP_3,28.84 //
GP12garup3_u:3928: buddhiḥ patnī sā dvirūpā khagendra duṣṭā caikā tvaparā suṣṭhurūpā /
GP12garup3_u:3929: tayormadhye duṣṭarūpā kaniṣṭhā jyeṣṭhā tu yā suṣṭhubuddhisvarūpā // GarP_3,28.85 //
GP12garup3_u:3930: kaniṣṭhayā naṣṭatāṃ yāti jīvaḥ sutiṣṭhantyā yāti yogyāṃ pratiṣṭhām /
GP12garup3_u:3931: kaniṣṭhāyāḥ śṛṇu vakṣye svarūpaṃ śrutvā tasyāstyāgabuddhiṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,28.86 //
GP12garup3_u:3932: jīvaṃ yaṃ vai prerayantī kaniṣṭhā kāmyaṃ dharmaṃ kurute sarvadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:3933: kva brāhmaṇāḥ kva ca viṣṇurmahātmā kva vai kathā kva ca yajñāḥ kvagāvaḥ // GarP_3,28.87 //
GP12garup3_u:3934: kva cāśvatthaḥ kva ca snānaṃ kva śaucametatsarvaṃ nāma nāśaṃ karoti /
GP12garup3_u:3935: mūḍhaṃ patiṃ reṇukāṃ pūjayasva māyādevyā dīpadānaṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,28.88 //
GP12garup3_u:3936: subhairavādīn bhaja mūḍha tvamandha hāridracūrṇandhārayeḥ sarvadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:3937: jyeṣṭhāṣṭamyāṃ jyeṣṭhadevīṃ bhajasva bhaktyā sūtraṃ galabandhaṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,28.89 //
GP12garup3_u:3938: marigandhāṣṭamyāṃ marigandhaṃ bhajasva tathā sūtraṃ svagale dhārayasva /
GP12garup3_u:3939: dīpastaṃbhaṃ sudine pūjayasva tatsūtrameva svagale dhārayasva // GarP_3,28.90 //
GP12garup3_u:3940: mahālakṣmīṃ cādyalakṣmīṃ ca samyak pūjāṃ kuru tvaṃ hi bhaktyātha jīva /
GP12garup3_u:3941: lakṣmīsūtraṃ svāgale dhārayasva mahālakṣmīvān bhavasītyuttaratra // GarP_3,28.91 //
GP12garup3_u:3943: suvāsinīḥ pūjayasvāśu bhaktyā gandhaiḥ puṣpairdhūpadīpaiḥ pratoṣya // GarP_3,28.92 //
GP12garup3_u:3945: picumandapatrāṇi vitatya bhūmau namasva tvaṃ kṣamyatāṃ ceti coktvā // GarP_3,28.93 //
GP12garup3_u:3946: mahādevīṃ pūjayasvādya bhaktyā sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ mā dadasvāpyathānnam /
GP12garup3_u:3947: sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ yadi vānnaṃ dadāsi bhāgyaṃ ca te paśyato nāśameti // GarP_3,28.94 //
GP12garup3_u:3948: svavāmahaste veṇupātre nidhāya dīpaṃ dhṛtvā savyahaste pate tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3949: uttiṣṭha bhoḥ pañcagṛheṣu bhikṣāṃ kuruṣva samyak pravihāyaiva lajjām // GarP_3,28.95 //
GP12garup3_u:3950: ādau gṛhe ṣaḍrasānnaṃ ca kutvā jagadgopyaṃ bhojanaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:3951: taccheṣānnaṃ bhojayitvā pate tvaṃ tāsāṃ ca re śaraṇaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,28.96 //
GP12garup3_u:3952: tāsaṃ hastaṃ pustake stāpayitvā trāhityevaṃ tanmukhairvācayasva /
GP12garup3_u:3954: taiḥ sārdhaṃ tvaṃ śvānaśabdaṃ kuruṣva haridrācūrṇaṃsarvadā tvaṃ dadhasva /
GP12garup3_u:3955: kuruṣva tvaṃ bhīmasenasya pūjāṃ pañcāmṛtaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiścopacāraiḥ // GarP_3,28.98 //
GP12garup3_u:3956: tatkaupīnaṃ raupyajaṃ kārayitvā samarpayitvā dīpamālāṃ kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:3957: taddāsavaryān bhojayasvādya bhaktyā garjasva tvaṃ bhīmabhīmeti suṣṭhu // GarP_3,28.99 //
GP12garup3_u:3959: mahādevaṃ pūjayasvādya samyag mahārudrairatirudraiśca samyak // GarP_3,28.100 //
GP12garup3_u:3961: śākaṃbharīṃ vivisaḥ sarvaśākānsupācayitvā ca gṛhe gṛhe ca // GarP_3,28.101 //
GP12garup3_u:3963: kulādevaṃ pūjayasvādya bhaktyā tvaṃ dṛgbhyāṃ vai taddine śaṃbhubuddhyā // GarP_3,28.102 //
GP12garup3_u:3964: tadbhaktavaryānpūjayasvādya samyak tatpādamūle vandanaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:3965: supañcamyāṃ mṛnmayīṃ śeṣamūrtiṃ pūjāṃ kuruṣva kṣīralājādikaiśca // GarP_3,28.103 //
GP12garup3_u:3966: sunāgapāśaṃ hi gale ca baddhvā taccheṣānnaṃ bhojayerbhoḥ punastvam /
GP12garup3_u:3967: dine caturthe bhoja yasvādya bhaktyā naivedyānnaṃ bhojayasvādya suṣṭhu // GarP_3,28.104 //
GP12garup3_u:3968: ityādikaṃ prerayitvā patiṃ sā jīvena naṣṭaṃ prikarotyeva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:3969: tasyāḥ saṃgājjīvarūpaḥ patistvāṃ samyagdaṣṭāmihaloke paratra // GarP_3,28.105 //
GP12garup3_u:3970: tasyāḥ saṃgaṃ suvidūraṃ visṛjyaceṣṭvā samagraṃ kuru sarvadā tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3971: subuddhirūpā tvīrayantī jagāda bhajasva viṣṇuṃ paramādareṇa // GarP_3,28.106 //
GP12garup3_u:3972: hariṃ vinānyaṃ na bhajasva nityaṃ sā reṇukā tvāṃ tu na pālayiṣyati /
GP12garup3_u:3973: adṛṣṭanāmā haririve hi nityaṃ phalaprado yadi na syātkhagendra // GarP_3,28.107 //
GP12garup3_u:3974: jugupsitāṃ śrutyanuktāṃ ca devīṃ patidruhāṃ sarvadā sevayitvā /
GP12garup3_u:3975: tasyāḥ prasādātkuṣṭhabhagandarādyairbhuktvā duḥ khaṃ saṃyaminīṃ prayāhi // GarP_3,28.108 //
GP12garup3_u:3976: tadā kudavī kutra gatā vadasvame hyataḥ pate tvaṃ na bhajasva devīm /
GP12garup3_u:3977: pate bhaja tvaṃ brāhmaṇānvaiṣṇavāṃśca saṃsāraduḥ khāttāransuṣṭhurūpān // GarP_3,28.109 //
GP12garup3_u:3978: sevādikaṃ pravīhāyaiva svacchaṃ māyādevyā bhajanātkiṃ vadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3979: jyeṣṭhāṣṭamyāṃ jyeṣṭhadevīṃ hyalakṣmīṃ lakṣmīti buddhyā pūjayitvā ca samyak // GarP_3,28.110 //
GP12garup3_u:3980: tasyāḥ sūtraṃ galabaddhaṃ ca kṛtvā nānāduḥ khaṃ hyanubhūyāḥ pate tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3981: yadā pate yamādūtaiśca pāśairbaddhvā ca samyak tāḍyamānaiḥ kaśābhiḥ // GarP_3,28.111 //
GP12garup3_u:3982: tadā hyalakṣmīḥ kutra palāyate 'sāvato mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva /
GP12garup3_u:3983: pate bhaja tvaṃ sarvadā vāyutattvaṃ na cāśrayestvaṃ sūkṣmaskandaṃ ca mūḍha // GarP_3,28.112 //
GP12garup3_u:3984: tadvattaṃ tvaṃ navanītaṃ ca bhaktyā taducchiṣṭaṃ bhakṣayitvā pate hi /
GP12garup3_u:3985: tasyāśca sūtraṃ galabaddhaṃ ca kṛtvā ihaiva duḥ khānyanubhūyāḥ pate tvam // GarP_3,28.113 //
GP12garup3_u:3986: yadā pate yamadūtaiśca pāśairbaddhvā ca samyak tāḍyamānaḥ kaśābhiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3987: tadā skandaḥ kutra palāyate 'sāvato mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva // GarP_3,28.114 //
GP12garup3_u:3988: dīpastaṃbhaṃ dāpayitvā pate tvaṃ sūtraṃ ca baddhvā svagale ca bhaktyā /
GP12garup3_u:3989: tadā baddhvā yamadūtaiśca pāśairdīpastaṃbhaistāḍyamānastu samyak // GarP_3,28.115 //
GP12garup3_u:3990: dīpastaṃbhaḥ kutra palāyitobhūdato mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva /
GP12garup3_u:3991: lakṣmīdine pūjayitvā ca lakṣmīṃ sūtraṃ tasyāḥ svagale dhāraya tvam // GarP_3,28.116 //
GP12garup3_u:3992: yadā pate yamadūtaiśca pāśairbadhvā samyak tāḍyamānaḥ kaśābhiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3993: tadā lakṣmīḥ kutra palāyate 'sāvato mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva // GarP_3,28.117 //
GP12garup3_u:3995: varārārtikaṃ kāṃsyapātre nidhāya kṛtvārtikyaṃ udaudaiti śabdam // GarP_3,28.118 //
GP12garup3_u:3996: tathaiva daṣṭvā picumandasya patraṃ sunartayitvā paramādareṇa /
GP12garup3_u:3997: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca pāśairbaddhvābaddhvā tāḍyamānaśca samyak // GarP_3,28.119 //
GP12garup3_u:3998: tava svāminkuladevo mahātmanpalāyitaḥ kutra me tadvadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3999: svadehānāṃ pūjayitvā ca samyakkaṇṭhābharaṇairvidhurāṇāṃ ca keśaiḥ // GarP_3,28.120 //
GP12garup3_u:4001: yadā tadā kutra palāyitā sā keśairvihīnā laṃbakarṇaṃ ca kṛtvā // GarP_3,28.121 //
GP12garup3_u:4002: svavāmahaste veṇupātraṃ nidhāya dīpaṃ dhṛtvā savyahaste ca mūḍhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4003: gṛhegṛhe bhaikṣacaryāṃ ca kṛtvā saṃtiṣṭhamāne svagṛhaṃ caiva devī // GarP_3,28.122 //
GP12garup3_u:4004: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca mūḍha dīpaiḥ sahasrairdahyamānaśca samyak /
GP12garup3_u:4005: nirnāsikā reṇukā mūḍhabuddhe palāyitā kutra sā me vadasva // GarP_3,28.123 //
GP12garup3_u:4006: sadā mūḍhaṃ khaḍgadevaṃ ca bhaktyā taṃ bhaktavatpūjayitvā ca samyak /
GP12garup3_u:4007: taiḥ sārdhaṃ tvaṃ śvānavadgarjayitvā saṃtiṣṭhamāne svagṛhe caiva nityam // GarP_3,28.124 //
GP12garup3_u:4008: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca samyak saṃtāḍyamānastatra śabdaṃ prakurvan /
GP12garup3_u:4009: saṃtiṣṭhamāne bhaktavaryaṃ vihāya tadā devaḥ kutra palāyitobhūt // GarP_3,28.125 //
GP12garup3_u:4010: sa pārthakyādbhīmasenapratīkaṃ pañcāmṛtaiḥ pūjayitvā ca samyak /
GP12garup3_u:4011: suvyañjane cānnakaupīnameva dattvā mūḍhastiṣṭhamāne svagehe // GarP_3,28.126 //
GP12garup3_u:4012: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca samyak saṃtāḍyamāne yamamārge ca mūḍhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4013: bhīmaḥ sa vai kutra palāyitobhūto mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva // GarP_3,28.127 //
GP12garup3_u:4014: mahādevaṃ pūjayitvā ca samyak haretyuktvā svagṛhe vidyamāne /
GP12garup3_u:4015: yadā gṛhaṃ dahyate vahninā tu tadā haraḥ kutra palāyitobhūt // GarP_3,28.128 //
GP12garup3_u:4016: śākaṃ bharīdivase sarvameva śākaṃbharī sā ca devī mahātman /
GP12garup3_u:4017: palāyitā kutra me tvaṃ vadasva kulāladevaṃ pūjayitvā ca bhaktyā // GarP_3,28.129 //
GP12garup3_u:4018: kārpāsaṃ vai tena dattaṃ gṛhītvā saṃtiṣṭhamāne yamadūtaiśca samyak /
GP12garup3_u:4020: vihāya vai kutra palāyitobhūnna jñāyate 'nveṣaṇāccāpi kena // GarP_3,28.1130 //
GP12garup3_u:4021: yadā pañcamyāṃ mṛnmayīṃ śeṣamūrtiṃ saṃpūjya bhaktyā vidyamāne svagehe /
GP12garup3_u:4022: tadā baddhvā yamadūtāśca samyak saṃnahyamāne nāgapāśaiścabaddhvā // GarP_3,28.131 //
GP12garup3_u:4023: svabhaktavaryaṃ pravihāya nāgaḥ palāyitaḥ kutra vai saṃvada tvam /
GP12garup3_u:4025: saṃtiṣṭhaṃmāne yamadūtaiśca samyak saṃtāḍyamāne taptadaṇḍaiśca mūḍha /
GP12garup3_u:4026: dantaṃ vihāyaiva ca vighnarājaḥ palāyitaḥ kutra me taṃ vadatvam // GarP_3,28.133 //
GP12garup3_u:4027: vivāhakāle piṣṭadevīṃ subhaktyā saṃpūjayitvā vidyamāno gṛhe sve /
GP12garup3_u:4028: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca baddhvā saṃpīḍyamāno yamamārge sa mūḍhaḥ // GarP_3,28.134 //
GP12garup3_u:4029: viṣṭhādevī pīḍyamānaṃ ca bhaktaṃ vihāya sā kutra palāyitābhūt /
GP12garup3_u:4030: vivāhakāle rajakasya gehaṃ gatvā samyak prārthayitvā ca mūḍhaḥ // GarP_3,28.135 //
GP12garup3_u:4031: yastaṃbhasūtraṃ kalaśe parītya pūjāṃ kṛtvā vidyamāno gṛhe sve /
GP12garup3_u:4032: yadā tadā yamadūtaśca samyak taṃ staṃbhasūtraṃ tasya mukhe nidhāya // GarP_3,28.136 //
GP12garup3_u:4033: saṃtāḍyamāne saṃtabhasūtrasthadevī palāyitā kutra me saṃvadasva /
GP12garup3_u:4034: vivāhakāle pūjayitvā ca samyak caṇḍāladevīṃ bhaktavaśyāṃ ca tasyāḥ // GarP_3,28.137 //
GP12garup3_u:4035: tadbhaktavaryaiḥ śūrpamadhye ca tīre saṃsevayitvā vidyamāno gṛhesve /
GP12garup3_u:4036: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca baddhvā saṃtāḍyamāno yamamārge mahadbhiḥ // GarP_3,28.138 //
GP12garup3_u:4038: jvarādibhiḥ pīḍyamāne svaputre gṛhe sthitaṃ brahmadevaṃ ca samyak // GarP_3,28.139 //
GP12garup3_u:4039: dhūrpairdīpairbhakṣyabhojyaiśca puṣpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā vidyamānaśca gehe /
GP12garup3_u:4040: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca baddhvā saṃtāḍyamāne veṇupāśādibhiśca // GarP_3,28.140 //
GP12garup3_u:4041: sa brahmadevaḥ kva palāyitobhūtsumūḍhabuddhe viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva /
GP12garup3_u:4042: santānārthaṃ bṛhatīṃ pūjayitvā galena baddhvā bṛhatīṃ vai phalaṃ ca // GarP_3,28.141 //
GP12garup3_u:4044: tadā devī bṛhatī mūḍhabuddhe palāyitā kutra me tadvada tvam // GarP_3,28.142 //
GP12garup3_u:4045: bhajasva mūḍha paradaivataṃ ca nārāyaṇaṃ tārakaṃ sarvaduḥ khāt /
GP12garup3_u:4046: sukṣudradeveṣu matiṃ ca mā kuru na ca śṛṇu tvaṃ phalguvākyaṃ tathaiva // GarP_3,28.143 //
GP12garup3_u:4047: sukṣudradevān bhindipāle nidhāya visarjayitvā dūradeśe mahātman /
GP12garup3_u:4048: saṃdhārya tvaṃ svakulācāradharmaṃ saṃpātane narakaṃ hetubhūtam // GarP_3,28.144 //
GP12garup3_u:4049: punīhi gātraṃ sarvadā mūḍhabuddhe mantrāṣṭakairjanmatīrthe pavitre /
GP12garup3_u:4050: hṛdi sthitāṃmārairvyamudrāṃ vihāya kṛtvābhūṣāṃ viṣṇumudrābhiragryām // GarP_3,28.145 //
GP12garup3_u:4051: sadā mūḍho harivārtāṃ bhajasva hyāyurgataṃ vyarthamevaṃ kubuddhyā /
GP12garup3_u:4052: sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ saṃgamo durlabhaśca kṣubdhaṃ jñānaṃ tāratamyasvarūpam // GarP_3,28.146 //
GP12garup3_u:4053: hariṃ guruṃ hyanusṛtyaiva satyaṃ gatiṃ svakīyāṃ tena jānīhi mūḍha /
GP12garup3_u:4054: dagdhvā duṣṭāṃ buddhimevaṃ ca mūḍha subuddhirūpaṃ mā bhajasvaiva nityam // GarP_3,28.147 //
GP12garup3_u:4055: mayā sārdhaṃ sadguruṃ prāpya samyagvairāgyapūrvaṃ tattvamātraṃ viditvā /
GP12garup3_u:4056: tenaiva mokṣaṃ prāpnumo nārjavairyattāryā viṣṇoḥ saṃprasādācca lakṣmyāḥ // GarP_3,28.148 //
GP12garup3_u:4057: ityāśayaṃ manasā sannidhāya tathā coktaṃ bhaktavaryo madīyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4058: ato bhaktaḥ pravahetyeva saṃjñāmavāpa vīndra prakṛtaṃ taṃ śṛṇu tvam // GarP_3,28.149 //
GP12garup3_u:4059: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe tāratamyanirūpaṇadvārā viṣṇorevopāsyatvamityarthanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśatamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:4063: yo dharmo brahmaṇaḥ putro hyādisṛṣṭau tvagudbhavaḥ // GarP_3,29.1 //
GP12garup3_u:4066: pāpināṃ śikṣakattvātsa yama ityucyate budhaiḥ // GarP_3,29.2 //
GP12garup3_u:4068: prahlādānantaraṃ gaṅgā bhāryā vai varuṇasya ca /
GP12garup3_u:4071: jñānasvarūpadaṃ viṣṇuṃ yamo jānāti sarvadā // GarP_3,29.4 //
GP12garup3_u:4072: ato gaṅgeti sā jñeyā sarvadā lokapāvanī /
GP12garup3_u:4073: bhaktyā viṣṇupadītyeva kīrtitā nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,29.5 //
GP12garup3_u:4074: yā pūrvakāle yajñaliṅgasya viṣṇoḥ sākṣāddharervikramataḥ khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:4075: vāmasya pādasya nakhāgrataśca nirbhidya cordhvāṇḍakaṭāhakhaṇḍam // GarP_3,29.6 //
GP12garup3_u:4078: śaśikaravaragaurāṃ mīnanetrāṃ supūjyāṃ smarati haripadotthāṃ mokṣameti krameṇa // GarP_3,29.7 //
GP12garup3_u:4079: indropi vāyukaramarditavāyukūṭabinduṃ ca prāśya śirasi hyasahiṣṇumānaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4081: bhaktyā ca khinnahṛdayaḥ paramādareṇa dhṛtvā svamūrdhni paramo hyaśivaḥ śivo 'bhūt // GarP_3,29.8 //
GP12garup3_u:4084: dvitīyenaiva rūpeṇa gaṅgā bhāryā ca śantanoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4085: suṣeṇā vai suṣeṇasya bhāryā sā vānarī smṛtā // GarP_3,29.10 //
GP12garup3_u:4086: maṇḍūkabhāryā gaṅgā tu saiva maṇḍūkinī smṛtā /
GP12garup3_u:4087: evaṃ catvārī rūpāṇi gaṅgāyā iti kirtitamam // GarP_3,29.11 //
GP12garup3_u:4090: śaraṃvarāya pañcajanyācca pañca hitvā jagdhvā garvakaṃ ṣaṭkrameṇa /
GP12garup3_u:4091: svabāṇasya svahṛdi saṃsthitasya bhajetsadā naiva bhaktiṃ viṣaṃ ca // GarP_3,29.13 //
GP12garup3_u:4092: liṅgaṃ puṣṭaṃ naiva kāryaṃ sadaiva liṅgaṃ puṣṭaṃ kāryamevaṃ sadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:4093: yonau saktirnaiva kāryā sadāpi yonau mukte 'saṃgato yāti muktim // GarP_3,29.14 //
GP12garup3_u:4095: etāvatā śarabhākhyo mahātmā sa cāntaro sa tu parjanya eva // GarP_3,29.15 //
GP12garup3_u:4096: śaśvatkeśā yasya gātre khagendra prabhāsyante śarabhākhyo payotaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4097: yamasya bhāryā śyāmalā yā khagendra yasmātsadā kalibhāryāpiyā ca // GarP_3,29.16 //
GP12garup3_u:4098: matvā samyak mānasaṃ yā karoti hyataśca sā śyāmalāsaṃjñakābhūt /
GP12garup3_u:4099: malaṃ vakṣye haribhaktervirodhī sulohapātre sannidhānaṃ ca tasya // GarP_3,29.17 //
GP12garup3_u:4100: tadvaiṣṇavaistyājyamevaṃ sadaiva vastraṃ dagdhaṃ sandhijaṃ caiva janyam // GarP_3,29.18 //
GP12garup3_u:4101: cikitsitaṃ paraduḥ khaṃ khagendra darerbhaktaistyājyamevaṃ sadaiva // GarP_3,29.18 //
GP12garup3_u:4102: noccāśca te haribhaktervihīnāsteṣāṃ saṃgo naiva kāryaḥ sadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:4103: purāṇasaṃparkavisarjinaṃ ca purāṇatālaṃ ca purāṇavastram // GarP_3,29.19 //
GP12garup3_u:4104: sujīrṇakanthājinamekhalaṃ ca yajñopavītaṃ ca kalipriyaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4105: priyaṃ gṛhaṃ corṇavitā nakaṃ ca samitkuśaiḥ pūritaṃ kutsitaṃ ca // GarP_3,29.20 //
GP12garup3_u:4106: sarvaṃ cetkalibhāryāpriyaṃ ca naiva priyaṃ śārṅgapāṇeḥ kadācit /
GP12garup3_u:4107: kāṃsye supakvaṃ yāvanālasya cānnaṃ tuṣaḥ piṇyākaṃ tumbabilve palāṇḍuḥ // GarP_3,29.21 //
GP12garup3_u:4108: dīrghaṃ takraṃ svāduhīnaṃ kaḍūṣṭaṇamete sarve kalibhāryāpriyāśca /
GP12garup3_u:4109: sudurmukhaṃ nindanaṃ cāryajānāṃ satovamatyātmajānāṃ prasahya // GarP_3,29.22 //
GP12garup3_u:4112: ityādi sarvaṃ kalibhāryāpriyañca sunirmalaṃ prikarotyeva sarvam /
GP12garup3_u:4113: ataśca sā śyāmaleti svasaṃjñāmavāpa sā devakī saṃbabhūva // GarP_3,29.24 //
GP12garup3_u:4114: yudhiṣṭhirasyaiva babhūva patnīsaṃbhāvitā tatra ca devakī sā /
GP12garup3_u:4115: candrasya bhāryā rohiṇī vai tadeyamaśvinyādibhyo 'hyadhikā sarvadaiva // GarP_3,29.25 //
GP12garup3_u:4116: roṇīṃ dhṛtvā rohati yogyasthānaṃ tasmācca sā rohiṇīti prasiddhā /
GP12garup3_u:4117: ādityabhāryā nāma saṃjñā khagendra jñeyā sā nārāyaṇasya svarūpā // GarP_3,29.26 //
GP12garup3_u:4118: saṃjānātītyeva saṃjñāmavāpa saṃjñeti loke sūrya bhāryā khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:4119: brahmaṇḍasya hyabhimānī tu devo virāḍiti hyabhidhāmāpa tena // GarP_3,29.27 //
GP12garup3_u:4120: gaṅgādiṣaṭkaṃ samameva nityaṃ parasparaṃ nottamaṃ nādhamaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4121: pradhānāgneḥ pāvikānyaiva gaṅgā sadā śubhā nātra vicāryamasti // GarP_3,29.28 //
GP12garup3_u:4122: āsāṃ jñānatpuṇyamāpnoti nityaṃ sadā hariḥ prīyate keśavolam /
GP12garup3_u:4123: gaṅgādibhyo hyavarāhyagnijāyā svāhāsaṃjñādhiguṇā naiva hīnā // GarP_3,29.29 //
GP12garup3_u:4124: svāhākāro mantrarūpābhimānī svāheti saṃjñāmāpa sadaiva vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:4125: agnerbhāryāto buddhimān saṃbabhūva brahmābhimānī candraputro budhaśca // GarP_3,29.30 //
GP12garup3_u:4126: buddhyāharadvai rāṣṭrajātaṃ ca sarvaṃ dhṛtaṃ tvato budhasaṃjñāmavāpa /
GP12garup3_u:4127: evaṃ cābhūdabhimanyurmahātmā subhadrāyā jaṭhare hyarjunācca // GarP_3,29.31 //
GP12garup3_u:4128: kṛṣṇasya candrasya yamasya cāṃśaiḥ sa saṃyutastvaśvinorvai harasya /
GP12garup3_u:4129: svāhādhamaścandraputro budhastu pādāravinde viṣṇudevasya bhaktaḥ // GarP_3,29.32 //
GP12garup3_u:4131: budhādhamā sā vijñeyā svāhā daśaguṇādhamā // GarP_3,29.33 //
GP12garup3_u:4132: nakulasya bhāryā māgadhasyaiva putrī śalyātmajā sahadevasya bhāryā /
GP12garup3_u:4133: ubhe hyete aśvibhāryā hyuṣāpi upāsate ṣaḍguṇaṃ viṣṇumādyam /
GP12garup3_u:4134: ato 'pyuṣāsaṃjñakā sā khagendra anantarāñchṛṇu vakṣye mahātman // GarP_3,29.34 //
GP12garup3_u:4136: ataḥ śanaiścaro nāma uṣāyāśca daśādhamāḥ // GarP_3,29.35 //
GP12garup3_u:4137: karmātmā puṣkaro jñeyaḥ śanaratha yamo mataḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4140: atastu puṣkalo nāma loke sa parikīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,29.37 //
GP12garup3_u:4142: prātaḥ kāle samutthāya smarennārāyaṇaṃ harim // GarP_3,29.38 //
GP12garup3_u:4148: gavāṃ kaṇḍūyane caiva smaredgovardhanaṃ harim // GarP_3,29.41 //
GP12garup3_u:4151: sparśe gavāṃ caiva sadā nṛṇāṃ vai bhavatyato nātra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:4152: yasmin gṛhe nāsti sadottamā ca gauryaṅgaṇe śrītulasī ca nāsti // GarP_3,29.43 //
GP12garup3_u:4153: yasmin gṛhe devamahotsavaśca yasmin gṛhe śravaṇaṃ nāsti viṣṇoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4154: tatsaṃsargādyāti duḥ khādikaṃ ca tasya sparśo naiva kāryaḥ kadāpi // GarP_3,29.44 //
GP12garup3_u:4159: vatsyasya stanapāne ca bālakṛṣṇaṃ tu saṃsmaret /
GP12garup3_u:4162: puṇḍrāṇāṃ dhāraṇe caiva keśavādīṃśca dvādaśa // GarP_3,29.48 //
GP12garup3_u:4164: padmaṃ nārāyaṇīṃ mudrāṃ kruddholkādīṃśca saṃsmaret // GarP_3,29.49 //
GP12garup3_u:4168: annādyarpaṇakāle tu vāsudevaṃ ca saṃsmaret // GarP_3,29.51 //
GP12garup3_u:4171: yajñopavītasya ca dhāraṇe tu nārāyaṇaṃ vāmanākhyaṃ smarettu /
GP12garup3_u:4172: ārtikyakāle ca tathaiva viṣṇoḥ samyak smaretparśurāmākhyaviṣṇum // GarP_3,29.53 //
GP12garup3_u:4174: smarettu bhaktyā paramādareṇa nārāyaṇaṃ jāmadagnyākhyarāmam // GarP_3,29.54 //
GP12garup3_u:4175: trivāratīrthagrahaṇasya kāle kṛṣṇaṃ rāmaṃ vyāsadevaṃ krameṇa /
GP12garup3_u:4176: śaṅkhodakasyoddharaṇe caiva kāle mukundarūpaṃ saṃsmaretsarvadaiva // GarP_3,29.55 //
GP12garup3_u:4177: grāsegrāse smaraṇaṃ caiva kāryaṃ govindasaṃjñasya viśuddhamannam /
GP12garup3_u:4178: ekaikabhakṣyagrahaṇasya kāle samyak smaredacyutaṃ vai khagendra // GarP_3,29.56 //
GP12garup3_u:4179: śākādīnāṃ bhakṣaṇe caiva kāle dhanvantariṃ smareccaiva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:4180: tathā parānnasya ca bhogakāle smarecca samyak pāṇḍuraṅgaṃ ca viṣṇum // GarP_3,29.57 //
GP12garup3_u:4181: haiyaṅgavīnasya ca bhakṣaṇe vai samyak smarettāṇḍavākhyaṃ ca kṛṣṇam /
GP12garup3_u:4182: dadhyannabhakṣe paramaṃ purāṇaṃ gopālakṛṣṇaṃ saṃsmareccaiva nityam // GarP_3,29.58 //
GP12garup3_u:4183: dugdhānnabhoge ca tathaiva kāle samyak smarecchrīnivāsaṃ hariṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4188: gaṅgāmṛtasyaiva ca pānakāle gaṅgātātaṃ saṃsmaredviṣṇumeva // GarP_3,29.61 //
GP12garup3_u:4190: putrādīnāṃ cuṃbane caiva kāle suveṇuhastaṃ saṃsmaretkṛṣṇameva // GarP_3,29.62 //
GP12garup3_u:4191: sukhaṅgakāle svastriyaścaiva nityaṃ gopi kucadvandvavilāsinaṃ harim /
GP12garup3_u:4192: tāṃbūlakāle saṃsmaraiccaiva nityaṃ pradyumnākhyaṃ vāsudevaṃ hariṃ ca // GarP_3,29.63 //
GP12garup3_u:4193: śayyākāle saṃsmareccaiva nityaṃ saṃkarṣaṇākhyaṃ viṣṇurūpaṃ hariṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4194: nidrākāle saṃsmaretpadmanāmaṃ kathākāle vyāsarūpaṃ hariṃ ca // GarP_3,29.64 //
GP12garup3_u:4196: śrīmattulasyāśchedane caiva kāle śrīrāmarāmeti ca saṃsmarettu // GarP_3,29.65 //
GP12garup3_u:4197: puṣpādīnāṃ chedane caiva kāle samyaka smaredetkapilākhyaṃ hariṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4198: pradakṣiṇegāruḍāntargataṃ ca hariṃ smaretsarvadā vai khagendra // GarP_3,29.66 //
GP12garup3_u:4199: praṇamakāle devadevasya viṣṇoḥ śeṣāntasthaṃ saṃsmareccaiva viṣṇum /
GP12garup3_u:4201: pūrtiryadā kriyate karmaṇāṃ ca samyak smaredvāsudevaṃ hariṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4202: evaṃ kṛtāni karmāṇi hariprītikarāṇi ca // GarP_3,29.68 //
GP12garup3_u:4204: etasmādeva pakṣīśa karma yatsamudāhṛtam puṣkarākhyānamatulaṃ śṛṇoti śraddhayānvitaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4206: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe kṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde tattvarahasyaṃ nāmaikonatriṃśodhyāyaḥ
